column2:
['Job Description We are looking for a senior full-stack engineer to build and manage our entire web infrastructure. Our project entails implementing our pre-approved UI, constructing our API, connecting the two, and setting up our servers infrastructure. This includes all associated areas such as database and architecture design.
Main Responsibilities
Design and implementation of the overall web architecture and development
“Pixel-perfect” implementation of our user interface
Design and deployment of our database
Ensuring the entire stack is designed and built for speed and scalability
Design and construction of our REST API
Integrating our front-end UI with the constructed API/Backend applications
Design and implementation of continuous integration and deployment', 'Your Skills and Experience Must have:
Main program languages are PHP/Python
5+ years of experience developing large-scale applications using Micro service such as Laravel/Lumen/Django.
Hands-on experience with HTML5, CSS3, ECMAScript 6 (minimum).
Proficient knowledge on git version control, Docker
Integrating third party Payment Processing APIs & Webservices.
Database design and management, including being up on the latest practices and associated version
MySQL/PostgreSQL and MongoDB
Appreciation for clean and well documented code
Base in Ho Chi Minh city
Fluent in both English and Vietnamese
Nice to have:
Experienced with Vue/React framework is a plus.
Experience of developing application using AWS or relevant cloud platform is a plus .
Experience implementing testing platforms and unit tests is a plus
Outstanding problem-solving and organizational skills with a strong attention to detail
Thorough understanding of user experience and possibly even product strategy', "Why You'll Love Working Here Attractive salary (depends on experience)
Bonus package (up to $3000)
Personal Health Insurance
International working environment
13th month salary
Opportunity to gain experience in the attractive fintech industry
Bike parking
Always receive support from team if have personal issues
Access to network of mentors and talents"]

column2:
['Top 3 Reasons To Join Us Fast growing Proptech company
Yearly Performance bobus
Good Environment & Great Team', 'Job Description ·       Understand business processes, applications and how data is stored and gathered.
·       Develop and manage streaming data pipelines at enterprise scale.
·       Build expertise on the data. Own data quality for various data flows.
·       Design, build and manage data marts to satisfy our growing data needs.
·       Support data marts to provide intuitive analytics for internal customers.
·       Design and build new framework and automation tools to enable teams to consume and understand data faster.
·       Use your expert coding skills across a number of languages like SQL, Python and Java to support data scientists.
·       Interface with internal customers to understand data needs.
·       Operate & manage, ensure the reliability of database.
·       Support developers on optimizing queries, data structure.
·       Collaborate with multiple teams and own the solution end-to-end.
·       Maintain infrastructure for our data pipelines.
·       Any other ad-hoc duties.', 'Your Skills and Experience ·       BS degree in Computer Science or a related technical field. MS or PhD degree is a plus.
·       More than 2 years of advanced Python or Java development is necessary. Scala or Kotlin experience is a plus.
·       Experience working with infrastructure-as-code systems like AWS Cloud Formation. DevOps experience is a plus.
·       More than 2 years of SQL (such as PostgreSQL, Oracle, AWS Redshift, or Hive) experience is required. NoSQL experience is a plus.
·       More than 2 years working with Linux OS. Knowledge of networks and cybersecurity is a plus.
·       Experience with modern Map Reduce/workflow distributed systems, especially Apache Spark.
·       Experience with Apache Kafka is a plus.
·       Experience in custom ETL pipeline design, implementation and maintenance.
·       Experience working with visualization tools like Tableau or Apache Superset.
·       Ability in analyzing data to identify deliverables, gaps and inconsistencies.
·       Ability in managing and communicating data mart plans to internal customers.
·       Proficient in English communication is a must', "Why You'll Love Working Here ·     Be able to fully participate in social insurance, health insurance and unemployment insurance in accordance with the laws and regulations of the Company. Insurance are based on full salary. In addition, the Company will provide employees with Bao Viet Health Insurance.
·     Holiday bonus and lunch allowance.
·     Increasing salary based on employees' KPIs and productivity.
·     13th month salary bonus, annual productivity salary, ...
·     Be able to join training courses and participate in soft skills development courses according to the Company's policy;
·     Opportunity to learn and develop professional knowledge and skills.
·     Increasing salary for qualified employees, as well as enthusiastic and long-term employees of the Company;
·     Team building every year."]

['Top 3 Reasons To Join Us 13th month salary and bonus
18 leaves per year
Medical benefits for family', 'Job Description Meeting with the software design team to discuss verification protocols.
Identifying software application weaknesses and target areas.
Sketching out ideas for automated software test procedures.
Reviewing software bug reports and highlighting problem areas.
Writing automation scripts and implementing software applications.
Designing and installing software databases.
Troubleshooting automation software and finalizing system procedures.
Identifying quality issues and creating test reports.
Collaborating with the design team to solve application faults.', 'Your Skills and Experience Have 2 - 6 years of working experience
Good programming experience in at least one of them (Perl/TCL/Python/Java/C/C++)
Good application/product testing experience
Good understanding and work experience in one of the OS skills (Unix/Linux/Windows)
Working experience of automation using JAVA with Selenium web driver/Appium/QTP or experience of Python automation using Robot/Pytest frameworks
Automation testing experience using frameworks TestNG, MAVEN.', "Why You'll Love Working Here HCL Technologies is a next-generation global technology company that helps enterprises reimagine their businesses for the digital age. Our technology products, services, and engineering are built on four decades of innovation, with a world-renowned management philosophy, a strong culture of invention and risk-taking, and a relentless focus on customer relationships. With a worldwide network of R&D, innovation labs and delivery centers, and 176,000+ ‘Ideapreneurs’ working in 50 countries, HCL serves leading enterprises across key industries, including 250 of the Fortune 500 and 650 of the Global 2000. We offer an integrated portfolio of products, solutions, services, and IP through our Mode 1-2-3 strategy built around Digital, IoT, Cloud, Automation, Cybersecurity, Analytics, Infrastructure Management and Engineering Services, amongst others, to help enterprises reimagine their businesses for the digital age. 
At HCL, we do not discriminate (and do not tolerate any discrimination) on the basis of race, religion, sex, colour, age, national origin, pregnancy, sexual orientation, physical ability, or any other characteristics. All employment decisions, from hiring to separation, will be based on business requirements, candidate’s merit and qualification, and in compliance with the local law.
HCL Technologies has been named by Forbes as being ranked number 30 of The World’s Best Employers for 2020, honouring HCL among the top global employers in the world
Visit us: www.hcltech.com"]

column2:
['Top 3 Reasons To Join Us 13th month salary and bonus
Chance to onsite 49 countries
Medical benefits for family', 'Job Description As a Hadoop big data engineer, you will develop, operate and drive scalable and resilient data platform based on Hadoop ecosystem to address the business requirements:  
• Ensure industry best practices around data pipelines, metadata management, data quality, data governance and data privacy 
• Design and implement business-specific large-scale data processing pipelines 
  
• Work with complex data structures, manipulate, cleanse data, and perform transformations to make insights from data. 
• Responsible to Ingest data from files, streams, and databases. Process the data with PySpark, Kafka, Hive, Hive LLAP… 
• Develop efficient software code for multiple use cases leveraging Spark and Big Data Technologies for various use cases built on the platform 
• Provide high operational excellence guaranteeing high availability and platform stability.', 'Your Skills and Experience ➢ Must requirements:  
• Experience in Hadoop ecosystem including HDFS, MapReduce, YARN, HBase, Zookeeper, Pig, Hive… 
• Experience in building large-scale data processing (batch-processing, stream processing)  
• Experience with Apache Spark preferably in PySpark 
• Understanding of SLA and meeting Timelines for support activities 
➢ Good to Have: 
• Experience with Hadoop distributions such as Cloudera, HortonWorks, comparison and feasibility 
• Experience in Apache Kafka, Apache Beam 
• Experience with Data warehouse 
• Experience in ETL 
• Experience in Data management:  o Data Governance  o Data Architecture  o Data Modelling  o Data Quality  o Data integration 
• Experience in SQL and NoSQL Database 
• Good in programming language Python, Java 
• Experience with SRE, Patching & Automation: Kubernetes or Docker & Containerization • Experience working with Big Data on Cloud environment 
• Experience with Google Cloud  
• Experience in Backend development using Java 
• Experience in Data API 
• Good to have Architecture knowledge or experience ']

Annual health check
Summer and new year vacation', "Job Description We are looking for Back-end Engineer who are willing to learn about Ruby, passionate about coding, solving problems and generating solutions that increase the performance and security of the application.

Research and implement solutions to optimize system performance
Report working progress to VN and JP team leaders via meetings, JIRA and slack
Update and suggest new technologies that improve our product
Perform other related duties as required by supervisors and managers", 'Your Skills and Experience 1. Language skills: English (some preferred, but not required) or Japanese (some preferred, but not required)
2. Computer skills: Object-oriented programming such as Ruby, PHP or Python

column2:
['Top 3 Reasons To Join Us Work with iconic IT projects a
Be part of a high-performing
Work with the brightest minds', 'Job Description VinBrain is a company funded by VinGroup, the largest conglomerate in Vietnam by market capitalization. Our mission is to perform cutting-edge research and development of AI, Machine Learning, and Deep Learning technologies and products that will lead to improve healthcare system and quality of life. At VinBrain, we believe the greatest promise of Big Data lies in healthcare. We believe that by solving unique and challenging problems at the intersection of (medical) Big Data, AI, IoT, and IoP (Internet of People), we can improve the outcomes for patients around the globe. We have assembled seasoned researchers, engineers, and entrepreneurs from world-class companies such as Microsoft, Amazon, Adobe and Google to build the platform and services to achieve this. If you are motivated to be part of something special and to be a catalyst for improving lives and healthier communities, we want to talk to you.
Who we are looking for: experienced backend engineers who will play a central role in building out both the large-scale intelligent products that runs in the cloud to improve patients and doctor experiences. As a member of our dynamic, agile team, you will have influence on defining product features, design and implement products features and drive operational excellence, and spearhead the engineering best practices that enable a high-quality product.
Design and implement core and software components for our system
Analyze and improve efficiency, scalability, and stability of various system resources
Optimize machine learning algorithms for runtime and integrate them into products
Understand clinician workflows, work closer with experts (doctors, specialists) and how our product can best fit into those workflows
Familiar and growing your own expertise in machine learning
Collaborate effectively with product managers and applied scientists to build successful products
Build software framework that optimize and reuse in development life cycle
Practice disciplined software engineering (e.g. automated testing, code reviews)
 ', "Your Skills and Experience Bachelor's Degree in computer science or related field, or equivalent practical experience
Possess strong skills in object-oriented software design and programming
Experience in at least one of the programming languages: Java, JavaScript/TypeScript, NodeJS, React, Python
Experience in REST API design and implementation
Experience with a variety of SQL and NoSQL databases
Experience working with systems dealing with large scale data storage, processing (real-time and batch), and analytics
Working knowledge with one or more of open source technologies: Hadoop, Yarn, Spark, Kafka, Storm, Hive, Docker, Kubernetes and source control tools such as Git
Experience in mobile development on Android and iOS platforms. Familiar with native app development or cross-platform frameworks: Swift, Kotlin, ReactNative, Flutter
Experience in a DevOps environment to deploy your own code is a plus", "Why You'll Love Working Here What Working at VinBrain offer
VinBrain offers an attractive remuneration package commensurate with your work experience where you’ll be rewarded for your individual and team performance. Plus we offer:
• Work with iconic IT projects and programs
• Be part of a high-performing, agile, start up culture
• Work with the brightest minds in the industry
Other Benefits:
• 13th month salary and other bonus policies of the Company.
• Enjoy all the insurance regimes under the provisions of the Labor Law (Social Insurance, Health Insurance and unemployment insurance) and get the Health Insurance according to the position level, periodical health checks at Pretigious hospitals and medical Centers nationalwide.
• Enjoy the preferential regime when using the services of Vingroup such as Vinpearl hotels; medical examination and treatment at Vinmec Hospital; shopping at Vinmart supermarkets and Retail shops; Children attend Vinschool educational system
• Participate in professional training courses, improve professional skills."]

['Top 3 Reasons To Join Us Dự án Fintech lớn & thách thức
Chính sách đãi ngộ cực hấp dẫn
Cơ hội thăng tiến & phát triển', 'Job Description -  Phát triển các dịch vụ Backend cho ứng dụng Mobile
-  Phát triển ứng dụng quản lý tập đoàn, ứng dụng Backend cho IoT, ứng dụng Realtime
-  Tối ưu hóa hiệu năng ứng dụng
-  Kiến trúc, viết mã một cách chuyên nghiệp
-  Báo cáo kịp thời, chính xác, đầy đủ thông tin liên quan đến công việc cho Quản lý trực tiếp theo định kỳ hoặc đột xuất.', 'Your Skills and Experience - Tốt nghiệp Đại học trở lên ngành CNTT… hoặc các ngành có liên quan (ngành kỹ thuật S/W, ngành kỹ thuật công nghiệp…)
- Làm việc nhóm hiệu quả với Git, GitFlow
- Thành thảo viết mã OOP, một trong các ngôn ngữ lập trình: Java, C#, Typescript, python
- Có kinh nghiệm làm việc với Cloud Function (Google, AWS) và deploy Cloud Function, API Gateway, Firebase
- Sử dụng thuần thục các công cụ kiểm soát lỗi, profiling
- Có kỹ năng trong việc viết các Unit Test, Automation Test, Integrated Test
- Có nhiều hiểu biết liên quan tới dữ liệu và cơ sở dữ liệu: Firestore, SQL
- Am hiểu cách sử dụng RESTful API có thể tự thiết lập server test API
- Có kinh nghiệm với các dịch vụ Cloud của Google như Firebase, Cloud VM
- Tối thiểu 2 năm kinh nghiệm làm backend
- Có tinh thần học hỏi, tìm hiểu công nghệ mới và khả năng làm việc nhóm
- Có kinh nghiệm chia tách cấu hình cho ứng dụng, theo môi trường chạy khác nhau.
Ưu tiên:
- Sử dụng giao diện dòng lệnh tốt, và có thể viết ứng dụng dạng command-line (nhận tham số truyền vào, hiển thị trợ giúp)
- Có thể viết ứng dụng web bằng các ngôn ngữ backend.
- Hiểu biết về DevOps, viết script CI/CD, docker, viết script cho các task runner để tự động hóa một số công việc lặp đi lặp lại là lợi thế
- Có khả năng deploy ứng dụng server
- Am hiểu network protocol (Websocket, MQTT...) là lợi thế', "Why You'll Love Working Here - Được hưởng mức thu nhập cạnh tranh theo năng lực.
- Được đào tạo, bồi dưỡng về nghiệp vụ trong quá trình làm việc;
- Các chế độ bảo hiểm theo quy định của Tập đoàn sau khi ký HĐLĐ chính thức.
- Thưởng lễ, Tết theo quy định của Tập đoàn và kết quả SXKD của Tập đoàn."]

Work-from-home with full benefits during Covid-19
Effective online training for newcomers', 'Job Description Exciting, new opportunities exist in our development team responsible for a large-scale system from a world-leading company. We are looking for Cloud Engineers to work on the project Life Cycle Management, which includes deployment, installation, integration, backup and restoration.
By joining our team, you will have a chance to collaborate with senior engineers from Australia, Sweden and other countries to:
Build tools, and develop features that manage and deploy the applications in Cloud infrastructures (OpenStack, VMware)
Perform pre-studies, make prototypes and provide work instructions based on different kinds of Cloud infrastructures
Automate the installation and deployment
Design, develop, test and maintain features
Work with Continuous Integration (CI) systems (Jenkin, Travis CI, etc)
You will live a true Agile & Lean culture where employees are empowered at all levels to collaborate and take ownership. At DEK Vietnam, we constantly run the Scrum mentorship and Agile Coaching programs to help build up your career path.', 'Your Skills and Experience Must have:

Experience with Bash script or Python
Familiar with Linux environment
Basic knowledge about Network configuration

 Attractive, competitive salary and incentives

column2:
['Top 3 Reasons To Join Us Bonus up to 25% annual salary
Work on highly scalable system
Chance to learn new technology', 'Job Description We are looking for an exceptional Senior Data Scientist to synthesize and leverage our data to understand our customers and improve our business.
As a Senior Data Scientist, you will work with cross-functional team members to identify and prioritize actionable, high-impact insights across a variety of core business areas. You will research, design, implement and validate cutting-edge algorithms to analyze diverse sources of data to achieve targeted outcomes. Additionally, you will help to manage and provide guidance to Junior Data Scienists in the team.
Responsibilities
Given the available data, perform analysis and identify potential problems that can be taken to improve company business.
Work with cross-functional team members across different projects.
Design and implement Machine Learning solutions to address the project’s problems.
Manage and provide guidance to Junior Data Scientists in the team.', 'Your Skills and Experience Having at least three years working experience in the field
Getting knowledge of statistical and predictive modeling concepts, machine learning approaches, data mining, clustering and classification techniques, recommendation and optimization algorithms.
Being proficient in any of the following programming languages: R, Python, Java, Scala.
Being familiar with all popular libraries used in maching learning such as numpy, pandas, scikit-learn, nltk, fasttext.
Being familiar with at least one popular deep learning frameworks such as Tensorflow, Pytorch, or  Keras.io.
Being familiar with AWS ecosystem (EC2, S3), and Google Cloud (Google Big Query)
Being familiar with at least one database systems such as MySQL, MongoDB, AWS Redshift, or AWS Postgres.
Optional Requirements
Having a Master or PhD. Degree in Computer Science, Applied Statistics, Mathematics or a related Quantitative Discipline.
Being familiar with Big Data (MapReduce, Spark)
Having experience in working with Stream Data
Having experience in working with Recommendation Engine, Object Detection, Image Classification, or Text Classification.', "Why You'll Love Working Here ZALORA is the leading e-commerce company providing fashion throughout South East Asia. ZALORA Engineering has teams in Singapore and Vietnam to serve millions of users in Malaysia, Singapore, Hong Kong, Taiwan, Indonesia, Philippines. This regional diversity presents a lot of interesting challenges that you and your colleagues will face. You will learn a lot by tackling these challenges.
ZALORA's e-commerce platform is built with love by the engineering team. The Ho Chi Minh office, 12 Ton Dan, D4 (ZALORA Group) focuses completely on engineering and sets a high standard for software development in the field of e-commerce. This team creates the tech stack that powers ZALORA's stellar shopping experience. This ranges from the online shop and the mobile apps to ZALORA's complex logistics solutions.
MacBook will be provided
Opportunity to gain exposure working in 6 Southeast Asian markets
Premium Healthcare insurance (support for parents, spouse, and children)
Yearly performance bonus (up to 3 months)
15 days annual leave
Company trip every year and many outing trips
Budget for your individual training"]

['Top 3 Reasons To Join Us 13th month salary & Bonus
Premium Healthcare Plan
New Macbook provided', 'Job Description At Zühlke, you are where innovation happens. We focus on teamwork, agile collaboration, and leading technologies to shape the future and challenge the status quo. We like to break down barriers and explore new territory. This is how we innovate.

Our reputation is fundamental to our business, so our culture emphasizes quality, reliability, and respect. We value learning new technologies and skills thus, we invest in a generous local training budget to attend conferences, participate in certified courses, and our annual technical camp is a lot of fun.
As a Fullstack Software Engineer based in our Vietnam office, you will:
Cooperate with interdisciplinary regional teams based in Asia and Europe in different projects and experience how technology and team spirit unite to create innovative solutions
Work closely with clients to develop, test, and ship software that meets their needs and efficiently and competently solve complex software challenges', "Your Skills and Experience You have a degree in computer science or an equivalent related field (bachelor's/master's).
You have at least 5 years of professional working experience in Java/ Python/ Golang/ NodeJs Stack
You enjoy building and deployment of Full Stack applications, including practice with automated testing frameworks
You have knowledge in the JavaScript ecosystem and use frameworks like ReactJS and Angular
You enjoy working in a remote consultancy environment with clients across Asia and Europe
Experience working in an agile development environment. Ideally, you are a certified Scrum developer or master will be an advantage
You are a strong communicator in English and value an open exchange with your team and towards your clients.", "Why You'll Love Working Here At Zühlke, we encourage a growth mindset and support the success of our employees with continuous training and coaching to further your career, your skills, and your personality. We regularly exchange ideas, give each other feedback, and learn from one another. From this, you'll gather that we communicate openly with each other, assess ourselves honestly and love working in diverse, cross-functional teams to achieve impressive results together.

Added to this is an attractive benefits package and a shared passion to give our best every day.
 Permanent labor contracts with 13 month salary
 Exclusive regional onboarding program
 Flexible working models between office days and days at home
 18 days annual leave, child care leave and 30 days sick leave
 New Macbook, Mouse and Keyboard provided
 Global profit sharing scheme
 Private health insurance scheme for you and your family
 Unique social & team building events locally and abroad"]

['Top 3 Reasons To Join Us Private Health Insurance
Performance bonus
Remote working 2 days/week', "Job Description If you want to join in exciting and challenging projects, MTI Tech AI Lab could be the next destination for your career.
MTI Technology specializes in creating smart mobile contents and services that transform and transcend customers' lives.
AI lab focus on providing AI-based solutions to add value to its clients. We are looking for a growth-minded developer to join us to be No.1 Data Science company in Vietnam.
 The Job
We are looking for growth-minded candidates with strong system design and experience in full stack development (Middle/Senior Level) (any programming languages/any stacks, some experiences with Python are a plus)
Our tech stacks include Python – Flask/Django – Linux/Cloud.
What you will do
Build AI Projects on AWS in collaboration with Data Scientist
Developing, testing, and deploying web systems for AI solutions
Researching new technology & sharing your deep technical knowledge
Planning and suggesting new apps and services for domains in Healthcare, Sales Analytics, Image Processing, etc.", 'Your Skills and Experience Who we are looking for:
Requirements:
1)   Technical Requirements:
Have a passion for system design and web service development
Have at least 3-year experience in software development
Be proficient in some programming languages (preferably Python, but any other languages are also welcomed if you’re willing to learn Python) and web frameworks
Have some experiences with Python (if Python is not dominant programming language)
Experience in performance optimization & high scalability in web application
Strong knowledge about clean coding, OOP, Dependency Injection, Design Patterns, Programming principles, Unit tests
Practical knowledge of frontend development HTML/CSS/JavaScript, jQuery
Practical knowledge of Cloud service (AWS or Microsoft Azure or GCP)
Practical knowledge of Linux (can learn on the job)
Be familiar with CI/CD
Comfortable with Agile methodology and have an Agile mindset
Practical knowledge of security for web application
Eager to learn new technologies and development processes
2)   Soft skill and language requirements:
Be proficient in English (verbal & written) to work in an international environment
Be a team player
Nice to have:
Having experience to work with Data Scientist is a big plus
Having experience in AI projects is a plus
Familiarity in one of these domains: Healthcare, Sales Analytics, Image Processing, etc.
Your Profile:
You are a logical thinker who loves to solve challenging problems (both technical and teamwork) 
You are keen to learn whatever programming languages and development processes necessary to improve     
You perform continuous improvement of yourself, the quality of code and the quality of teamwork
You believe in growing by working with other people in the team           
You believe in ‘try fast and fail fast’ to optimize code       
You love to deliver joyful user experiences', "Why You'll Love Working Here At MTI Technology Vietnam, we believe in making our employees stayed happy and beneficial from our talent developing culture and our perks. We offer you a dynamic and international workplace where you solve the big questions for our million-user products and be part of MTI Community. This is the place where you will develop your talent and meet with many other talented colleagues to share your big ideas, receive feedbacks and improve. Enrich your skills and develop your potential
Enjoy motivating working conditions', "Job Description Onpoint is the largest E-commerce enabler in Vietnam, providing end-to-end services, helping brands to accelerate and become more successful online in Vietnam and SEA region. Onpoint's mission is to make E-commerce easy for brands, to create sustainable values for businesses, consumers, and partners.
It's a privilege for us to serve top tier clients. Our integrated capabilities encompass all aspects of the E-commerce value chain covering store commercial and operations, digital marketing, customer services, warehousing and fulfillment. We help brand execute their E-com strategies by selling their goods directly to customers online or by providing services to assist with their E-com operations. Our business ranges from largest online shopping platforms as well as social shopping channels.
Since day one, we have dedicated ourselves to the needs of our brand partners. We work closely to ensure our direction and thought processes are tightly aligned with their needs
Join us, make a difference, and create value for life! We are looking for Bạckend Developer

column2:
['Top 3 Reasons To Join Us Top-notch compensation and engaging perks
Cool technologies and fascinating products
Flexible work hours and unlimited leave plan', 'Job Description Parcel Perform is looking for an amazing team member to support us in Software engineering! 
We are a dynamic, fast-growing team that’s excited about e-commerce and logistics and the opportunity to transform these industries with data and technology. Join us and our journey to drive growth in the e-commerce market. We are looking for you as a Data Engineer
WE NEED YOU ON OUR TEAM!
You will be part of a young & motivated team, driving the next level of growth of our Parcel Perform and Parcel Monitor applications that help customers track e-commerce shipments around the globe. As part of our team, you will have a very direct impact on the success of the company.
As a data engineer, you are in charge of the data ecosystem, which includes everything from data sources and databases to data storage solutions. These components are connected by pipelines that transport and transform data. Your work would orbit around the formation of a data lake, and system and tools to consume this data lake.
You will be working side by side with our engineers and data scientists in both data analysis processes and bringing prediction models to the production environment.
And you will also be developing analytical tools and programs. Though we are promoting the use of open sources, some situations call for bespoke software for better customization, user experience, and data accuracy.', 'Your Skills and Experience WHAT YOU SHOULD BRING ALONG!
We at Parcel Perform believe in innovation, energy, and resourcefulness for everything we do. We will not stop delivering an outstanding product that we can be proud of and need you to help us to inform the world. You need to feel the same way about our offering and bring along the following things:
The skills
At least 4 years of working as a data engineer
Solid foundation in Python and at least another language in the JVM family
Deep knowledge of SQL Database design
Experience with distributed system, high volume Databases, and ETL pipelines
Familiarity with Big data analysis
Exposure to a wide range of NoSQL solutions
Excellent critical thinking, organizational and communication skills
Strong ownership and good collaboration skills to work in a team
Good English communication', "Why You'll Love Working Here WHAT YOU WILL RECEIVE IN RETURN!
The competitive compensation package, and a preference for internal promotions.
Unlimited leave plan
Flexible working hours, and open environment. Work From Home is available by requests
Premium insurance and annual medical checkup
Free lunch, free fruit, snacks are provided.
Weekly 1-1 catch-up for training and career development, team bonding events, various training programs.
Unlimited to O’Reilly technical materials.
Opportunities to work alongside people from around the world that share the same passion and dedication.
Locating in a quiet area with little traffic, full of natural light and within walking distance to many convenient facilities, our office in Ho Chi Minh City makes work-life integration to the fullest."]

Good programming experience in at least one of them (Perl/TCL/Python/Java/C/C++)
Good application/product testing experience
Good understanding and work experience in one of the OS skills (Unix/Linux/Windows)
Working experience of automation using JAVA with Selenium web driver/Appium/QTP or experience of Python automation using Robot/Pytest frameworks
Automation testing experience using frameworks TestNG, MAVEN.', "Why You'll Love Working Here HCL Technologies is a next-generation global technology company that helps enterprises reimagine their businesses for the digital age. Our technology products, services, and engineering are built on four decades of innovation, with a world-renowned management philosophy, a strong culture of invention and risk-taking, and a relentless focus on customer relationships. With a worldwide network of R&D, innovation labs and delivery centers, and 176,000+ ‘Ideapreneurs’ working in 50 countries, HCL serves leading enterprises across key industries, including 250 of the Fortune 500 and 650 of the Global 2000. We offer an integrated portfolio of products, solutions, services, and IP through our Mode 1-2-3 strategy built around Digital, IoT, Cloud, Automation, Cybersecurity, Analytics, Infrastructure Management and Engineering Services, amongst others, to help enterprises reimagine their businesses for the digital age. 
At HCL, we do not discriminate (and do not tolerate any discrimination) on the basis of race, religion, sex, colour, age, national origin, pregnancy, sexual orientation, physical ability, or any other characteristics. All employment decisions, from hiring to separation, will be based on business requirements, candidate’s merit and qualification, and in compliance with the local law.
HCL Technologies has been named by Forbes as being ranked number 30 of The World’s Best Employers for 2020, honouring HCL among the top global employers in the world
Visit us: www.hcltech.com"]

['Top 3 Reasons To Join Us 13th month salary and bonus
Chance to onsite 49 countries
Medical benefits for family', 'Job Description As a Hadoop big data engineer, you will develop, operate and drive scalable and resilient data platform based on Hadoop ecosystem to address the business requirements:  
• Ensure industry best practices around data pipelines, metadata management, data quality, data governance and data privacy 
• Design and implement business-specific large-scale data processing pipelines 
  
• Work with complex data structures, manipulate, cleanse data, and perform transformations to make insights from data. 
• Responsible to Ingest data from files, streams, and databases. Process the data with PySpark, Kafka, Hive, Hive LLAP… 
• Develop efficient software code for multiple use cases leveraging Spark and Big Data Technologies for various use cases built on the platform 
• Provide high operational excellence guaranteeing high availability and platform stability.', 'Your Skills and Experience ➢ Must requirements:  
• Experience in Hadoop ecosystem including HDFS, MapReduce, YARN, HBase, Zookeeper, Pig, Hive… 
• Experience in building large-scale data processing (batch-processing, stream processing)  
• Experience with Apache Spark preferably in PySpark 
• Understanding of SLA and meeting Timelines for support activities 
➢ Good to Have: 
• Experience with Hadoop distributions such as Cloudera, HortonWorks, comparison and feasibility 
• Experience in Apache Kafka, Apache Beam 
• Experience with Data warehouse 
• Experience in ETL 
• Experience in Data management:  o Data Governance  o Data Architecture  o Data Modelling  o Data Quality  o Data integration 
• Experience in SQL and NoSQL Database 
• Good in programming language Python, Java 
• Experience with SRE, Patching & Automation: Kubernetes or Docker & Containerization • Experience working with Big Data on Cloud environment 
• Experience with Google Cloud  
• Experience in Backend development using Java 
• Experience in Data API 
• Good to have Architecture knowledge or experience ']

['Top 3 Reasons To Join Us Work with iconic IT projects
Be part of a high-performing
Work with the brightest minds', 'Job Description Tham gia thiết kế và phát triển hệ sinh thái phần mềm VinDr của VinBigData, trong đó bao gồm các giải pháp ứng dụng trí tuệ nhân tạo cho chẩn đoán hình ảnh y tế. Cụ thể:

Xây dựng hệ thống quản lý ca chụp tập trung (PACS) cho bệnh viện
Xây dựng tài liệu và viết Unit Test.', 'Your Skills and Experience Có kinh nghiệm làm việc và kiến thức tốt với HTML5, JavaScript, CSS3, SASS/SCSS.

Clean code.

Biết về NodeJS/Python là 1 lợi thế.

Có kiến thức tốt về UI và UX là lợi thế.
Có khả năng tự lập kế hoạch.
Có kinh nghiệm làm việc trong team theo quy trình Agile/Scrum.

Môi trường làm việc năng động.
Mức lương hấp dẫn.
Bảo hiểm sức khỏe tại Vinmec.
Ưu đãi sử dụng các dịch vụ thuộc hệ sinh thái Vingroup."]

['Top 3 Reasons To Join Us MacBook for work
Annual health check
Summer and new year vacation', "Job Description We are looking for Back-end Engineer who are willing to learn about Ruby, passionate about coding, solving problems and generating solutions that increase the performance and security of the application.
Main development duties are as follows:
Research, design and implement features for our company's service based on business requirements

Research and implement solutions to optimize system performance
Report working progress to VN and JP team leaders via meetings, JIRA and slack
Update and suggest new technologies that improve our product
Perform other related duties as required by supervisors and managers", 'Your Skills and Experience 1. Language skills: English (some preferred, but not required) or Japanese (some preferred, but not required)
2. Computer skills: Object-oriented programming such as Ruby, PHP or Python
3. Working experience: 0.5 years+

Working experience with Ruby on Rails or other MVC framework

Basic knowledge of Python

column2:
['Top 3 Reasons To Join Us Work with iconic IT projects a
Be part of a high-performing
Work with the brightest minds', 'Job Description VinBrain is a company funded by VinGroup, the largest conglomerate in Vietnam by market capitalization. Our mission is to perform cutting-edge research and development of AI, Machine Learning, and Deep Learning technologies and products that will lead to improve healthcare system and quality of life. At VinBrain, we believe the greatest promise of Big Data lies in healthcare. We believe that by solving unique and challenging problems at the intersection of (medical) Big Data, AI, IoT, and IoP (Internet of People), we can improve the outcomes for patients around the globe. We have assembled seasoned researchers, engineers, and entrepreneurs from world-class companies such as Microsoft, Amazon, Adobe and Google to build the platform and services to achieve this. If you are motivated to be part of something special and to be a catalyst for improving lives and healthier communities, we want to talk to you.
Who we are looking for: experienced backend engineers who will play a central role in building out both the large-scale intelligent products that runs in the cloud to improve patients and doctor experiences. As a member of our dynamic, agile team, you will have influence on defining product features, design and implement products features and drive operational excellence, and spearhead the engineering best practices that enable a high-quality product.
Design and implement core and software components for our system
Analyze and improve efficiency, scalability, and stability of various system resources
Optimize machine learning algorithms for runtime and integrate them into products
Understand clinician workflows, work closer with experts (doctors, specialists) and how our product can best fit into those workflows
Familiar and growing your own expertise in machine learning
Collaborate effectively with product managers and applied scientists to build successful products
Build software framework that optimize and reuse in development life cycle
Practice disciplined software engineering (e.g. automated testing, code reviews)
 ', "Your Skills and Experience Bachelor's Degree in computer science or related field, or equivalent practical experience
Possess strong skills in object-oriented software design and programming
Experience in at least one of the programming languages: Java, JavaScript/TypeScript, NodeJS, React, Python
Experience in REST API design and implementation
Experience with a variety of SQL and NoSQL databases
Experience working with systems dealing with large scale data storage, processing (real-time and batch), and analytics
Working knowledge with one or more of open source technologies: Hadoop, Yarn, Spark, Kafka, Storm, Hive, Docker, Kubernetes and source control tools such as Git
Experience in mobile development on Android and iOS platforms. Familiar with native app development or cross-platform frameworks: Swift, Kotlin, ReactNative, Flutter
Experience in a DevOps environment to deploy your own code is a plus", "Why You'll Love Working Here What Working at VinBrain offer
VinBrain offers an attractive remuneration package commensurate with your work experience where you’ll be rewarded for your individual and team performance. Plus we offer:
• Work with iconic IT projects and programs
• Be part of a high-performing, agile, start up culture
• Work with the brightest minds in the industry
Other Benefits:
• 13th month salary and other bonus policies of the Company.
• Enjoy all the insurance regimes under the provisions of the Labor Law (Social Insurance, Health Insurance and unemployment insurance) and get the Health Insurance according to the position level, periodical health checks at Pretigious hospitals and medical Centers nationalwide.
• Enjoy the preferential regime when using the services of Vingroup such as Vinpearl hotels; medical examination and treatment at Vinmec Hospital; shopping at Vinmart supermarkets and Retail shops; Children attend Vinschool educational system
• Participate in professional training courses, improve professional skills."]

Chính sách đãi ngộ cực hấp dẫn
Cơ hội thăng tiến & phát triển', 'Job Description -  Phát triển các dịch vụ Backend cho ứng dụng Mobile
-  Phát triển ứng dụng quản lý tập đoàn, ứng dụng Backend cho IoT, ứng dụng Realtime
-  Tối ưu hóa hiệu năng ứng dụng

-  Báo cáo kịp thời, chính xác, đầy đủ thông tin liên quan đến công việc cho Quản lý trực tiếp theo định kỳ hoặc đột xuất.', 'Your Skills and Experience - Tốt nghiệp Đại học trở lên ngành CNTT… hoặc các ngành có liên quan (ngành kỹ thuật S/W, ngành kỹ thuật công nghiệp…)
- Làm việc nhóm hiệu quả với Git, GitFlow
- Thành thảo viết mã OOP, một trong các ngôn ngữ lập trình: Java, C#, Typescript, python
- Có kinh nghiệm làm việc với Cloud Function (Google, AWS) và deploy Cloud Function, API Gateway, Firebase
- Sử dụng thuần thục các công cụ kiểm soát lỗi, profiling
- Có kỹ năng trong việc viết các Unit Test, Automation Test, Integrated Test
- Có nhiều hiểu biết liên quan tới dữ liệu và cơ sở dữ liệu: Firestore, SQL
- Am hiểu cách sử dụng RESTful API có thể tự thiết lập server test API
- Có kinh nghiệm với các dịch vụ Cloud của Google như Firebase, Cloud VM
- Tối thiểu 2 năm kinh nghiệm làm backend
- Có tinh thần học hỏi, tìm hiểu công nghệ mới và khả năng làm việc nhóm
- Có kinh nghiệm chia tách cấu hình cho ứng dụng, theo môi trường chạy khác nhau.
Ưu tiên:
- Sử dụng giao diện dòng lệnh tốt, và có thể viết ứng dụng dạng command-line (nhận tham số truyền vào, hiển thị trợ giúp)
- Có thể viết ứng dụng web bằng các ngôn ngữ backend.
- Hiểu biết về DevOps, viết script CI/CD, docker, viết script cho các task runner để tự động hóa một số công việc lặp đi lặp lại là lợi thế
- Có khả năng deploy ứng dụng server
- Am hiểu network protocol (Websocket, MQTT...) là lợi thế', "Why You'll Love Working Here - Được hưởng mức thu nhập cạnh tranh theo năng lực.
- Được đào tạo, bồi dưỡng về nghiệp vụ trong quá trình làm việc;
- Các chế độ bảo hiểm theo quy định của Tập đoàn sau khi ký HĐLĐ chính thức.
- Thưởng lễ, Tết theo quy định của Tập đoàn và kết quả SXKD của Tập đoàn."]

Cơ hợi thăng tiến, đào tạo chuyên sâu', 'Job Description - Nghiên cứu, xây dựng phương án, lập trình, thử nghiệm và tối ưu kết quả các bài toán trí tuệ nhân tạo thuộc các lĩnh vực:

['Top 3 Reasons To Join Us Chuyên gia đầu ngành

Môi trường năng động sáng tạo', 'Job Description ✔ Tham gia phân tích, thiết kế kiến trúc, phát triển các thành phần thuộc Giải pháp Giám sát an toàn thông tin (Security Information & Event Management)

✔ Thực hiện tối ưu hiệu năng cho các hệ thống đáp ứng khả năng xử lý hàng trăm nghìn sự kiện đồng thời
✔ Nghiên cứu, áp dụng các công nghệ mới vào phát triển sản phẩm (micro-service, native-cloud, CI/CD, event-driven)', 'Your Skills and Experience ✔ Tư duy tốt, nắm bắt công nghệ nhanh.
✔ Có ít nhất 3 năm kinh nghiệm lập trình sử dụng ngôn ngữ Python/Golang

✔ Biết sử dụng công nghệ NoSQL, Redis, Kafka, các công cụ DevOps
Ưu tiên:
✔ Có kinh nghiệm làm việc, triển khai các hệ thống thu thập và phân tích log tập trung (ELK, Graylog)', "Why You'll Love Working Here Lý do nên gia nhập VCS: 
Dẫn đầu thị trường
✔ Cơ hội được làm việc tại Công ty tiên phong mở đường trong lĩnh vực ATTT tại Việt Nam.
Cơ hội thử thách và phát triển
✔ Áp dụng kiến thức, kĩ năng, kinh nghiệm chuyên môn giải quyết các bài toán hấp dẫn, thử thách tại Viettel Cyber Security.
✔ Cơ hội thử sức ở lĩnh vực chuyên sâu, sản phẩm cạnh tranh toàn cầu góp phần thay đổi xã hội .

['Top 3 Reasons To Join Us Bonus up to 25% annual salary
Work on highly scalable system
Chance to learn new technology', 'Job Description We are looking for an exceptional Senior Data Scientist to synthesize and leverage our data to understand our customers and improve our business.
As a Senior Data Scientist, you will work with cross-functional team members to identify and prioritize actionable, high-impact insights across a variety of core business areas. You will research, design, implement and validate cutting-edge algorithms to analyze diverse sources of data to achieve targeted outcomes. Additionally, you will help to manage and provide guidance to Junior Data Scienists in the team.
Responsibilities
Given the available data, perform analysis and identify potential problems that can be taken to improve company business.
Work with cross-functional team members across different projects.
Design and implement Machine Learning solutions to address the project’s problems.
Manage and provide guidance to Junior Data Scientists in the team.', 'Your Skills and Experience Having at least three years working experience in the field
Getting knowledge of statistical and predictive modeling concepts, machine learning approaches, data mining, clustering and classification techniques, recommendation and optimization algorithms.
Being proficient in any of the following programming languages: R, Python, Java, Scala.
Being familiar with all popular libraries used in maching learning such as numpy, pandas, scikit-learn, nltk, fasttext.
Being familiar with at least one popular deep learning frameworks such as Tensorflow, Pytorch, or  Keras.io.
Being familiar with AWS ecosystem (EC2, S3), and Google Cloud (Google Big Query)
Being familiar with at least one database systems such as MySQL, MongoDB, AWS Redshift, or AWS Postgres.
Optional Requirements
Having a Master or PhD. Degree in Computer Science, Applied Statistics, Mathematics or a related Quantitative Discipline.
Being familiar with Big Data (MapReduce, Spark)
Having experience in working with Stream Data
Having experience in working with Recommendation Engine, Object Detection, Image Classification, or Text Classification.', "Why You'll Love Working Here ZALORA is the leading e-commerce company providing fashion throughout South East Asia. ZALORA Engineering has teams in Singapore and Vietnam to serve millions of users in Malaysia, Singapore, Hong Kong, Taiwan, Indonesia, Philippines. This regional diversity presents a lot of interesting challenges that you and your colleagues will face. You will learn a lot by tackling these challenges.
ZALORA's e-commerce platform is built with love by the engineering team. The Ho Chi Minh office, 12 Ton Dan, D4 (ZALORA Group) focuses completely on engineering and sets a high standard for software development in the field of e-commerce. This team creates the tech stack that powers ZALORA's stellar shopping experience. This ranges from the online shop and the mobile apps to ZALORA's complex logistics solutions.
MacBook will be provided
Opportunity to gain exposure working in 6 Southeast Asian markets
Premium Healthcare insurance (support for parents, spouse, and children)
Yearly performance bonus (up to 3 months)
15 days annual leave
Company trip every year and many outing trips
Budget for your individual training"]

['Top 3 Reasons To Join Us 13th month salary & Bonus
Premium Healthcare Plan
New Macbook provided', 'Job Description At Zühlke, you are where innovation happens. We focus on teamwork, agile collaboration, and leading technologies to shape the future and challenge the status quo. We like to break down barriers and explore new territory. This is how we innovate.

Our reputation is fundamental to our business, so our culture emphasizes quality, reliability, and respect. We value learning new technologies and skills thus, we invest in a generous local training budget to attend conferences, participate in certified courses, and our annual technical camp is a lot of fun.
As a Fullstack Software Engineer based in our Vietnam office, you will:
Cooperate with interdisciplinary regional teams based in Asia and Europe in different projects and experience how technology and team spirit unite to create innovative solutions
Work closely with clients to develop, test, and ship software that meets their needs and efficiently and competently solve complex software challenges', "Your Skills and Experience You have a degree in computer science or an equivalent related field (bachelor's/master's).
You have at least 5 years of professional working experience in Java/ Python/ Golang/ NodeJs Stack
You enjoy building and deployment of Full Stack applications, including practice with automated testing frameworks
You have knowledge in the JavaScript ecosystem and use frameworks like ReactJS and Angular
You enjoy working in a remote consultancy environment with clients across Asia and Europe
Experience working in an agile development environment. Ideally, you are a certified Scrum developer or master will be an advantage
You are a strong communicator in English and value an open exchange with your team and towards your clients.", "Why You'll Love Working Here At Zühlke, we encourage a growth mindset and support the success of our employees with continuous training and coaching to further your career, your skills, and your personality. We regularly exchange ideas, give each other feedback, and learn from one another. From this, you'll gather that we communicate openly with each other, assess ourselves honestly and love working in diverse, cross-functional teams to achieve impressive results together.

Added to this is an attractive benefits package and a shared passion to give our best every day.
 Permanent labor contracts with 13 month salary
 Exclusive regional onboarding program
 Flexible working models between office days and days at home
 18 days annual leave, child care leave and 30 days sick leave
 New Macbook, Mouse and Keyboard provided
 Global profit sharing scheme
 Private health insurance scheme for you and your family
 Unique social & team building events locally and abroad"]

['Top 3 Reasons To Join Us Private Health Insurance
Performance bonus
Remote working 2 days/week', "Job Description If you want to join in exciting and challenging projects, MTI Tech AI Lab could be the next destination for your career.

Our tech stacks include Python – Flask/Django – Linux/Cloud.

Build AI Projects on AWS in collaboration with Data Scientist

Researching new technology & sharing your deep technical knowledge
Planning and suggesting new apps and services for domains in Healthcare, Sales Analytics, Image Processing, etc.", 'Your Skills and Experience Who we are looking for:
Requirements:
1)   Technical Requirements:
Have a passion for system design and web service development
Have at least 3-year experience in software development
Be proficient in some programming languages (preferably Python, but any other languages are also welcomed if you’re willing to learn Python) and web frameworks

Be proficient in English (verbal & written) to work in an international environment
Be a team player
Nice to have:
Having experience to work with Data Scientist is a big plus
Having experience in AI projects is a plus
Familiarity in one of these domains: Healthcare, Sales Analytics, Image Processing, etc.
Your Profile:
You are a logical thinker who loves to solve challenging problems (both technical and teamwork) 
You are keen to learn whatever programming languages and development processes necessary to improve     
You perform continuous improvement of yourself, the quality of code and the quality of teamwork
You believe in growing by working with other people in the team           
You believe in ‘try fast and fail fast’ to optimize code       
You love to deliver joyful user experiences', "Why You'll Love Working Here At MTI Technology Vietnam, we believe in making our employees stayed happy and beneficial from our talent developing culture and our perks. ['Top 3 Reasons To Join Us Attractive salary + benefits

Flexible working from home', 'Job Description We are seeking talent with a strong background in machine learning and computer science (or related engineering fields) who has demonstrated practical experience to conduct research & development to help us create leading financial products. Your primary focus will be in (1) contributing to our leading R&D in Machine Learning and AI in finance, and (2) applying data mining techniques, doing statistical analysis, and building high-quality prediction systems integrated with our products in finance.

Collaborate with Business owners to define and design a roadmap for financial products

Enrich your skills and develop your potential
Enjoy motivating working conditions', "Job Description Onpoint is the largest E-commerce enabler in Vietnam, providing end-to-end services, helping brands to accelerate and become more successful online in Vietnam and SEA region. Onpoint's mission is to make E-commerce easy for brands, to create sustainable values for businesses, consumers, and partners.

We help brand execute their E-com strategies by selling their goods directly to customers online or by providing services to assist with their E-com operations. Our business ranges from largest online shopping platforms as well as social shopping channels.
Since day one, we have dedicated ourselves to the needs of our brand partners. We work closely to ensure our direction and thought processes are tightly aligned with their needs

Cool technologies and fascinating products
Flexible work hours and unlimited leave plan', 'Job Description Parcel Perform is looking for an amazing team member to support us in Software engineering! 
We are a dynamic, fast-growing team that’s excited about e-commerce and logistics and the opportunity to transform these industries with data and technology. Join us and our journey to drive growth in the e-commerce market. We are looking for you as a Data Engineer
WE NEED YOU ON OUR TEAM!
You will be part of a young & motivated team, driving the next level of growth of our Parcel Perform and Parcel Monitor applications that help customers track e-commerce shipments around the globe. As part of our team, you will have a very direct impact on the success of the company.
As a data engineer, you are in charge of the data ecosystem, which includes everything from data sources and databases to data storage solutions. These components are connected by pipelines that transport and transform data. Your work would orbit around the formation of a data lake, and system and tools to consume this data lake.
You will be working side by side with our engineers and data scientists in both data analysis processes and bringing prediction models to the production environment.
And you will also be developing analytical tools and programs. Though we are promoting the use of open sources, some situations call for bespoke software for better customization, user experience, and data accuracy.', 'Your Skills and Experience WHAT YOU SHOULD BRING ALONG!
We at Parcel Perform believe in innovation, energy, and resourcefulness for everything we do. We will not stop delivering an outstanding product that we can be proud of and need you to help us to inform the world. You need to feel the same way about our offering and bring along the following things:
The skills
At least 4 years of working as a data engineer
Solid foundation in Python and at least another language in the JVM family
Deep knowledge of SQL Database design
Experience with distributed system, high volume Databases, and ETL pipelines
Familiarity with Big data analysis
Exposure to a wide range of NoSQL solutions
Excellent critical thinking, organizational and communication skills
Strong ownership and good collaboration skills to work in a team
Good English communication', "Why You'll Love Working Here WHAT YOU WILL RECEIVE IN RETURN!
The competitive compensation package, and a preference for internal promotions.
Unlimited leave plan
Flexible working hours, and open environment. Work From Home is available by requests
Premium insurance and annual medical checkup
Free lunch, free fruit, snacks are provided.
Weekly 1-1 catch-up for training and career development, team bonding events, various training programs.
Unlimited to O’Reilly technical materials.
Opportunities to work alongside people from around the world that share the same passion and dedication.
Locating in a quiet area with little traffic, full of natural light and within walking distance to many convenient facilities, our office in Ho Chi Minh City makes work-life integration to the fullest."]

column2:
['Top 3 Reasons To Join Us Work with iconic IT projects a
Be part of a high-performing
Work with the brightest minds', 'Job Description VinBrain is a company funded by Vingroup, the largest conglomerate in Vietnam by market capitalization. Our mission is to perform cutting-edge research and development of AI, Machine Learning, and Deep Learning technologies and products that will lead to improve healthcare system and quality of life. At VinBrain, we believe the greatest promise of Big Data lies in healthcare. We believe that by solving unique and challenging problems at the intersection of (medical) Big Data, AI, IoT, and IoP (Internet of People), we can improve the outcomes for patients around the globe. We have assembled seasoned researchers, engineers, and entrepreneurs from world-class companies such as Microsoft, Amazon, Adobe and Google to build the platform and services to achieve this. If you are motivated to be part of something special and to be a catalyst for improving lives and healthier communities, we want to talk to you.

Who we are looking for: ML engineers who will play a central role in building out both the large-scale intelligent products that runs in the cloud to improve patients and doctor experiences. As a member of our dynamic, agile team, you will have influence on defining product features, design and implement products features and drive operational excellence, and spearhead the engineering best practices that enable a high-quality product.
 Responsibilities:
Designing and developing machine learning and deep learning systems
Running machine learning tests and experiments
Perform AI model optimization & model compression
Perform statistical analysis and fine-tuning using test results
Write reusable code and libraries for future use
Analyze and enhance application for maximum speed and scalability
Collaborate with team members and stakeholders
Bridge the gap between software engineers and applied scientists
Familiar and growing your own expertise in machine learning
Collaborate effectively with product managers and applied scientists to build successful products
Build software framework that optimize and reuse in development life cycle
Practice disciplined software engineering (e.g. automated testing, code reviews)', "Your Skills and Experience Bachelor's Degree in computer science or related field, or equivalent practical experience
Proven experience as a Machine Learning Engineer or similar role
Understanding of data structures, data modeling and software architecture
Deep knowledge of math, probability, statistics and algorithms
Ability to write robust code in Python, Java and C++
Possess strong skills in object-oriented software design and programming
Experience working with systems dealing with large scale data storage, processing (real-time and batch), and analytics
Experience in a DevOps environment to deploy your own code is a plus
Excellent communication skills
Ability to work in a team
Outstanding analytical and problem-solving skills", "Why You'll Love Working Here What Working at VinBrain offer
VinBrain offers an attractive remuneration package commensurate with your work experience where you’ll be rewarded for your individual and team performance. Plus we offer:
• Work with iconic IT projects and programs
• Be part of a high-performing, agile, start up culture
• Work with the brightest minds in the industry
Other Benefits:
• 13th month salary and other bonus policies of the Company.
• Enjoy all the insurance regimes under the provisions of the Labor Law (Social Insurance, Health Insurance and unemployment insurance) and get the Health Insurance according to the position level, periodical health checks at Pretigious hospitals and medical Centers nationalwide.
• Enjoy the preferential regime when using the services of Vingroup such as Vinpearl hotels; medical examination and treatment at Vinmec Hospital; shopping at Vinmart supermarkets and Retail shops; Children attend Vinschool educational system
• Participate in professional training courses, improve professional skills."]

column2:
['Top 3 Reasons To Join Us Môi trường chuyên nghiệp, trẻ trung, năng động
Nhiều hoạt động Team Building, Picnic, Training
Cơ hội làm việc Onsite đối với BrSE, Dev, Comtor', 'Job Description Tham gia phát triển website và các tính năng theo yêu cầu của khách hàng Nhật, Âu, Mỹ.
Làm việc onsite Nhật tùy theo yêu cầu khách hàng.
Hợp tác và trao đổi công việc với Team Member, Team Leader.
Tham gia phát triển các công đoạn phân tích yêu cầu, Detail Design, Coding, viết tài liệu API, Un
Sử dụng ngôn ngữ PHP và các framework như Laravel, Yii2, …
Báo cáo hàng ngày, hàng tuần cho Team Lead và các member khác theo mô hình Agile. 
 ', 'Your Skills and Experience Lợi thế:
Kinh nghiệm phát triển ứng dụng/services về mặt Back-End.
Thành thạo lập trình với một trong các ngôn ngữ lập trình Back-End: PHP, Python, Golang, AWS
Nắm rõ toàn bộ quá trình phát triển web (thiết kế, phát triển và thực thi)
Có hiểu biết cơ bản về cơ sở dữ liệu và hệ thống: MySQL, MongoDB hay PostgreSQL
Có kiến thức về lập trình hướng đối tượng.
Có kiến thức cơ bản về Linux và Server.
Khả năng làm việc tốt trong môi trường tốc độ cao.
Yêu cầu cụ thể:
Tham gia vào toàn bộ vòng đời của ứng dụng, tập trung và coding và debug các dự án website và hệ thống
Viết API kết nối giữa các hệ thống, và phục vụ trao đổi dữ liệu với mobile & front-end
Xây dựng code có thể sử dụng lại và các thư viện để thuận tiện cho việc sử dụng trong tương lai
Thu thập và xử lí các yêu cầu thiết kế và kĩ thuật
Tham gia vào quá trình phân tích và thiết kế hệ thống;
Nghiên cứu và áp dụng các công nghệ mới để tối ưu hóa hiệu quả phát triển sản phẩm.
Đảm bảo sản phẩm làm ra cần phải chạy đúng nghiệp vụ và tốc độ xử lý cũng phải tối ưu cho lượng người dùng lớn 
 ', "Why You'll Love Working Here 1. Thời gian và môi trường làm việc
Thời gian làm việc linh động 5 ngày/tuần từ 8h00 - 17h30 hoặc 8h30 - 18h00 (nghỉ Thứ 7, Chủ Nhật).
Môi trường làm việc chuyên nghiệp, năng động, công bằng, đồng nghiệp dễ thương..
Tôn trọng ý kiến cá nhân, đề cao sự sáng tạo. 
Văn phòng làm việc rộng rãi, trang phục tự do thoải mái.
Tham gia các câu lạc bộ: Tiếng Nhật, tiếng Anh, bóng đá, game,...
2. Lương và Phúc Lợi
Lương hấp dẫn Up to $2300
Đánh giá tăng lương 2 lần/năm, mức tăng lên đến 30%/lần.
Thu nhập năm 13 - 15 tháng lương (tối thiểu 13 tháng lương, tùy theo kết quả có thể lên đến 15 tháng lương).
Thưởng: 2 lần/năm, ngoài ra có thưởng nhân viên xuất sắc, thưởng Tết, thưởng giới thiệu nhân sự,...
Trợ cấp ăn trưa: 30.000/ngày, gửi xe, tiếng Nhật, tiếng Anh, chứng chỉ IT.
Nghỉ phép 12 ngày/năm, nghỉ ngày lễ kỷ niệm của gia đình: 1 ngày/năm, làm việc từ 6 tháng được tăng thêm ngày nghỉ phép.
Chế độ chăm sóc phụ nữ: nghỉ sinh lý 0.5 ngày/tháng.
Du lịch 1 lần/năm trong nước hoặc nước ngoài.
Tham gia các hoạt động teambuilding thường xuyên như: Tiệc sinh nhật, Happy lunch, Workshop,...
Khám sức khỏe định kỳ hàng năm tại các bệnh viện uy tín.
Được cung cấp thiết bị phục vụ công việc: Macbook, Ipad,...
Tham gia đầy đủ Bảo hiểm tuân thủ theo Luật Lao động hiện hành.
3. Cơ hội phát triển, thăng tiến
Được training từ chuyên gia công nghệ người Nhật giàu kinh nghiệm.
Có nhiều hoạt động nâng cao chuyên môn (Seminar, Workshop, Techtalk,...)
Có cơ hội thăng tiến lên các vị trí Leader, quản lý.
Có cơ hội làm việc và đào tạo tại Nhật Bản. 
 "]

['Top 3 Reasons To Join Us Attractive Salary, Incentives
Work on high-end technologies
Beloved working environment', 'Job Description Work together with other team members, be responsible for the whole lifecycle of an application or service, from conception, specification, development, testing, support, bug fixing
Work with Project Manager and customer support to understand requirements and drive feature development
Provide realistic time estimation for the features requested
Take part in the decision making of writing clean and simple and flexible architecture
Create tests, automation scripts, and work with operations to configure continuous integration tools
Work on a project composed of a core part (common for all customers) and extensions part (customer specificities)
Ensure to deliver high quality work that aligns with DMP’s strategy
Main Responsibilites::
Analyze current technology utilized within the company and develop steps and processes to improve and expand upon them.
Establish milestones for necessary contributions from departments and develop processes to facilitate their collaboration.
Work with Software Engineers to ensure that development follows established processes and works as intended
Work alongside project management teams to successfully monitor progress and implementation of initiatives.
Working on ways to automate and improve development and release processes
HERE’S A LITTLE TASTE OF YOUR DAILY CHALLENGE:
Analyze customer requirements, propose, design and develop AI solution/software to satisfy these requirements
Troubleshoot various type of issues and propose feasible solutions
Adapt with a frequent request to change from customer specification
Research state-of-the-art technologies and related papers to realize them on actual products
Debug and maintain the software running on target devices
Ability to involve in a complete prototype/product development: Hardwares and Softwares
Onsite opportunity to Japan/Other countries: Customer visit or Knowledge transfer', "Your Skills and Experience DMP is looking at your potential; neither your college name, your past companies, nor the country you come from. But to be successful in this role, this is the kind of profile we have in mind:
Experience of designing system using AWS, Azure, GCP
Understand the pros/cons of each service provided by AWS etc.
Design a system that combines multiple AWS services.
Experience of Python
High Logical Thinking; Design Thinking mindset and ability to troubleshoot occured issues
Experience in debugging and maintenance an embedded system is considered a big plus
Fluent English communication. Japanese is a plus
You're self-motivated, creative and independent, with a capableity of making technical decisions
Highly motivated on Research/Study new technology field, tool, and knowledge you don't know", "Why You'll Love Working Here DMP Vietnam does offer potential candidates not only a competitive package but also inevitable chance enabling them to grow in modern technologies.
Salary range: up to 2000$
Competitive salary on Vietnam IT market
13th month salary
Annual bonus on perfomance and contribution
MBO system with regular discussion on both individual performance and professional development
A working environment you would love to work with; high-end dynamic jobs which you feel grown-up day by day
International project with change of short-term onsite support
And many more which only be felt at a first working day at DMP."]

['Top 3 Reasons To Join Us Product company with global reputation in security
Competitive compensation package & salary reviews
Full social insurance & extra health-care program', 'Job Description The Position
We are looking for seasoned Software Engineer to deliver amazing technologies for our customers. You will develop, test, and deliver new capabilities for (but not only) OPSWAT Sandbox technology, as part of Malware Analysis Solution (MAS) product. You need to have a strong software programming background with the right personality to lead and set an example for the software development team in VN office. The ideal candidate will be a creative thinker and self-starter who can handle various type of technical problems with efficiency and effectiveness. This is an exciting opportunity to create a Malware Analysis Solution and bring it to be recognized as a top tier product in the market.
What You Will Be Doing
Implementing tasks from the UI to the backend and database
Independently track down and solve flaws in functionality
Test and document your code, create diagrams
Critical analysis and optimization of the current codebase
Working on a live production environment while maintaining 99.99% uptime
Use your expertise to train and mentor junior members of the team
Keep up-to-date with modern development technologies and methodologies
Motivate the product team to go above and beyond with continuous delivery and innovation', 'Your Skills and Experience What We Need From You
Previous experience in backend development
3+ years of Python programming experience in Linux and Windows operating system
Outstanding communication skills, experience in collaboration with engineer teams in multiple countries
Experience working with SQL and NoSQL databases
Experience working with Linux and Docker
Experience developing and consuming RESTful APIs and RPC
Experience with agile development, rapid release cycles, and supporting customer-oriented solutions
It Would Be Nice If You Had
Experience with C++ and/or Golang programming
Cybersecurity domain experience, especially malware analysis or network security.
Experience with CI/CD
Experience working in antimalware relative industry
Experience in system level development
Experience in x86 and x64 assembling language
Experience in VMware and/or hypervisor environment', "Why You'll Love Working Here Meaningful work with passionate colleagues
International working environment in global leading cyber security product company
Attractive compensation, regular assessments, and salary reviews
13-month bonus & performance bonus
10% salary, full insurances on probationary period
Extra-health care program (PVI) for employee and family members
15 to 20+ paid day off per year
Recognition best employees awards quarterly, yearly and special President Club award every year
Stock options for employees
Attractive benefits for team activities (team building, team outing, sport, trade union activities)
Nice open office on the top of a building in District 3 with full of accessories for active recreation, sport, fruits, coffee, and tea."]

Môi trường thân thiện, yêu thương', 'Job Description Phát triển, maintain các ứng dụng web trên nền Python
Tham gia vào dự án phát triển với khách hàng Nhật
Lập trình các module tính năng theo bản phân tích thiết kế.
Tham gia xây dựng các giải pháp, viết các phần mềm theo yêu cầu của công ty', 'Your Skills and Experience Có kinh nghiệm làm việc với Python
Thành thạo ngôn ngữ Python, có kinh nghiệm làm việc với một trong các framework sau : Django, Flask, hoặc các framework tương đồng

Có khả năng làm việc tự chủ và kỹ năng làm việc theo nhóm. Khả năng nắm bắt, học hỏi kỹ thuật mới nhanh.
Hoà đồng, sẵn sàng hợp tác cùng với mọi người để hoàn thành mục tiêu chung.
Có tinh thần trách nhiệm cao (với công việc, với khách hàng, với thành viên của Team và với chính mình)
 ', "Why You'll Love Working Here * Mức lương: Up to $2000

Phỏng vấn online trong thời gian dịch bệnh

column2:
['Top 3 Reasons To Join Us Surviving Covid & growing stronger every day
Training & Development
Premium Healthcare Insurance', 'Job Description About you
You are a talented and passion driven individual who values working in a fast-growing environment, delivering high quality client-oriented services and collaborating with your peers. You are a motivated, problem solver, detail oriented, and you have data related technical skills and energetic person who works well in a fast-paced, dynamic small-team environment. You learn quickly and are passionate about helping others.
What does it mean to be a Data engineer at Vincere?
As a Data Engineer you will become part of our Professional Services team to support our international clients all over the world. You will be working with our clients to define their data migration strategies through a detailed but easy to follow project plan. In performing your tasks you will work with a team of Data Engineers by using a variety of DataBase tools, formats and learning the best practices that we follow. You will be based in our Saigon office in Vietnam, working as part of a young, international team in one of Asia’s most dynamic cities. With offices opening in the US in early 2022,  this role is a natural stepping stone into either location for the right candidate.
About the job
What you get to do
Are you passionate about Data and databases?
Validate and analyze data sets to ensure data consistency and internal requirements are met
Develop ETL processes to complete data migrations from other software platform into our products in a timely and accurate manner
Develop procedures and scripts/coding for continuous improvement and repeatable / automation processes
Work with clients to generate data mapping documents, communication and manage project plans expectation with the client and business stakeholders
Produce client focused reports and logs of operations performed, including error reporting
Coordinate database changes and migrations with the technical team, projects’ team and management
Assist in technical direction for internal data models by coordinating with internal groups
Facilitate resolution of production data migration issues
Other projects and duties as required', 'Your Skills and Experience What We Need In You
Bachelor’s Degree in Technology related field or equivalent combination of education and work experience
Fluent in English
2+ years experience in working with databases, writing code to intake, clean and transform data
Expert in Python or Java programming language
Ability to develop SQL codes and expert in various tools such as MSSQL, PostgreSQL, MySQL, Pentaho, Talend, Pycharm, MongoDB and more
Strong experience or expert in migrating, loading and validating data sets from different sources as CSV, Excel, SQL into multiple environments. Have you done JSON migration? This is a plus.
Strong focus on automating repeatable tasks
Google Apps Scripts, Google Sheets, RegExp and Microservices experience
RestFul API (JSON), Data Warehouse experience
Web Application development in JAVA, PHP, Python
Develop Google Sheet and Excel formulas to automate data migration processes
Experience to use other power tools/languages like Javascript, Bash script, Java, Python would be a plus
Strong problem solving skills, including the ability to analyze complex problems and create well documented solutions
Proactive, adaptable, detail oriented and very well organised
Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English, interpersonal skills, and multitasking capabilities
Ability to work under pressure both independently and within a team, in a fast-paced environment', "Why You'll Love Working Here Vincere has a diverse, international, and supportive community culture. You’ll collaborate with coworkers and clients across Australia, Europe, the UK and the US. Our English-speaking environment lets you improve your language skills.
When you’re on #TeamVinny, you get the best benefits:
Premium healthcare insurance for every employee
Yearly health check-ups
13th month bonus salary
100% salary during probation period
Social Insurance on 100% salary
15 days of annual leave, with unused days rolled over to next year (unlimited)

 ', 'Your Skills and Experience At least 2 years of backend development experience

Chance to travel onsite (in 49 countries)', 'Job Description Feature grooming that includes deriving the solution approach for the required features with pertaining call flows, deployment, use cases coverage.

Review the functional specifications, test plans and code that are derived by the Development and test teams.

Work on any critical bug fix required or a critical customer issue.
