Strong understanding of Python
Experience with Linux and Docker
Preferred:
Strong understanding of Service Provider networks and cloud networking at scale (MPLS VPN, LDP/RSVP/BGP-LU, EVPN, MLAG, OSPF, VLANs, DWDM)
Ability to automate solutions to repetitive problems/tasks
Understanding of typical infrastructure services (e.g. databases, OpenSSH)
Experience with CI/CD, how it can be applied to network automation and a testing framework (Pytest)
Experienced with Cisco, Juniper and/or Arista networking equipment and the APIs they offer
Experience with SaltStack
Experience using automation tools (Chef, Puppet, Ansible, SaltStack) to deploy and configure network devices', "Why You'll Love Working Here HCL Technologies is a next-generation global technology company that helps enterprises reimagine their businesses for the digital age. Our technology products, services, and engineering are built on four decades of innovation, with a world-renowned management philosophy, a strong culture of invention and risk-taking, and a relentless focus on customer relationships. With a worldwide network of R&D, innovation labs and delivery centers, and 176,000+ ‘Ideapreneurs’ working in 50 countries, HCL serves leading enterprises across key industries, including 250 of the Fortune 500 and 650 of the Global 2000. We offer an integrated portfolio of products, solutions, services, and IP through our Mode 1-2-3 strategy built around Digital, IoT, Cloud, Automation, Cybersecurity, Analytics, Infrastructure Management and Engineering Services, amongst others, to help enterprises reimagine their businesses for the digital age. 
At HCL, we do not discriminate (and do not tolerate any discrimination) on the basis of race, religion, sex, colour, age, national origin, pregnancy, sexual orientation, physical ability, or any other characteristics. All employment decisions, from hiring to separation, will be based on business requirements, candidate’s merit and qualification, and in compliance with the local law.
HCL Technologies has been named by Forbes as being ranked number 30 of The World’s Best Employers for 2020, honouring HCL among the top global employers in the world
Visit us: www.hcltech.com"]

column2:
['Top 3 Reasons To Join Us Incredible challenges.
A great chance to impact millions of users.
Passionate & talented colleagues.', 'Job Description At Tiki, we believe in growing a sustainable business with strong fundamentals. It means acquiring new customers not just based on promotion but also on excellent customer service while maintaining an optimal spending. In the backend, it means aiming for efficiency and optimization in Fulfillment and Supply Chain. Together with a strong operation team, solid IT solutions is a key to enable all of that. It helps Tiki to survive and grow fast in a tough market like Vietnamese e-commerce.
As a member of Operation Product team, you will work on various solutions that manage our entire fleet of warehouses (inventory management, order fulfillment) and logistics network (including our own Tiki Delivery team – key enabler for initiative such as TikiNow). At the same time, we also support our Finance & Accounting team to record, track and optimize the company cash flow.
In more details, you will:
Work with Product Owner to understand the requirement and build the product within aligned timeline
Work with QC team to deliver bug-free product and also contribute for automation testing
Provide last-tier support for assigned product lines
We have a strong team with diversified background and a keen interest on being the best in e-commerce. You will gain more domain knowledge in what probably is one of the hottest IT sectors right now and have chances to encounter and solve challenging problems at large scale (think of millions of orders, millions of customers and a magnitude more of data in our backend system).', 'Your Skills and Experience For Junior:
• Experience with one of Python, NodeJS, Java.
• Understanding of RESTful API and SQL databases
• Ability to write well-documented, clean-code.
• Experience with Microservices, Continuous Integration/ Delivery (CI/CD) is a plus.
• Problem-solving skill and customer-oriented.
For Senior:
• Strong programming experience with one of Python, NodeJS, Java.
• Knowledge about RESTful API and databases as MySQL, PostgreSQL, Redis.IO, Elasticsearch…
• Ability to write well-documented, clean-code.
• Knowledge in Microservices, Continuous Integration/ Delivery (CI/CD) is an advantage.
• Understanding of system design and tuning for high performance, scalability and reliability.
• Customer-oriented and have a high bar of quality.
• Strong problem-solving skill.
 ', 'Why You'll Love Working Here Inside our engineering team:
We iterate constantly. There's no such thing as the best version of anything, just a constant streams of improvements and tests.
We move fast, really fast. Major changes can be executed in a few days, many times just a few hours.
We have a data-informed mindset. We try to use data to inform our decision as much as possible.
We are independent. Most of the time, your team will not need technical assistance from other teams.
We take risks. We're not afraid to challenge "best practices".
Our attractive offers include: 
Open communication with passionate and experienced members.
Challenging working environment.
Easy access to the library with tons of startup, product, UX, coding... books.
Private healthcare insurance.
Annual health check-ups.
Special internal programs for Tikiers when shopping on Tiki.vn (free ship TikiNow service, discount...).
Internal events to bond our mutual understanding & spirit such as team building, team outing, Tiki's birthday, year-end party...
New & beautiful office with a pantry room (with bar), entertainment & gymnastic equipment, yoga rooms, a library and an open space facilitating cross-department communication.
Competitive salary and performance review, 13th-month pay and bonus based on performance.']

Tham gia các dự án công nghệ trong và ngoài nước
Thu nhập hấp dẫn cùng những đại ngộ toàn diện', 'Job Description **Primary skills:
Overall 5+ years of experience with a strong background in EDW & ETL
3+ Years of PySpark coding and Azure experience is must
Must have experience in building ETL/ELT through PySpark.
Must have experience in designing job orchestration (ADF), sequence, metadata design, Audit trail, dynamic parameter passing and error/exception handling
Agile delivery- Person must be able to show/review design and code on daily basis
Person must know test cases creation, unit testing, integration testing and QA testing. Very good communication skills
Should be able to make design recommendations, and build out new design patterns
**Secondary skills:
Exposure Scala, Databricks, Delta lake and notebooks development
Able to do low level design and build reusable components
Zeal to learn new tool/technologies and adoption
Exposure with DevOpS and CICD', 'Your Skills and Experience Have a bachelor’s degree in IT or related fields
**Key success factors:
Results Focused and Outcome Driven
Creative Problem Solving
Teamwork and Cooperation
Effective Communication', "Why You'll Love Working Here Online interview accepted
Salary Up to 45M
13th salary, 13 leave days
“CMC care” health insurance
Annual Summer Vacation: follows company’s policy
Salary review 2 times/year or on excellent performance
International, dynamic, friendly working environment
Annual leave, working conditions follow Vietnam labor laws.
Other allowances: working on-site allowance, etc.
Total allowances: 16.000.000 VND ~ 17.000.000 VND per year
Time working: 8: 30 a.m – 5:30 p.m (Mon – Friday)
Working place: 01 Sang Tao, Tan Thuan, District 7, HCMC"]

column2:
['Top 3 Reasons To Join Us Môi trường làm việc mở, thoải mái
Làm việc trên những sản phẩm có hàng triệu users
Thưởng theo hiệu quả công việc trong từng dự án', 'Job Description a)    Xây dựng giải pháp ETL (extract, transform, load) với nhiều nguồn dữ liệu khác nhau bằng cách sử dụng Python, Celery, Airflow, Google Cloud (Bigquery, Storage, ...).
b)    Xử lý dữ liệu: làm sạch, chuyển hóa, chuẩn hóa, … để đảm bảo dữ liệu được tổ chức, lưu trữ hiệu quả, toàn vẹn, tin cậy.
c)     Tự động hóa các quy trình thủ công, tối ưu hóa việc cung cấp dữ liệu, thiết kế lại cơ sở hạ tầng để có khả năng mở rộng lớn hơn.
d)    Phối hợp, làm việc chặt chẽ với Data Analyst để hoàn thành công việc và đạt được hiệu suất cao trong việc sử dụng dữ liệu.
 ', 'Your Skills and Experience a)    Tốt nghiệp đại học chuyên ngành: Công nghệ thông tin, Công nghệ phần mềm, Điện tử viễn thông, Toán Tin, ...
b)    Thành thạo Python, RestAPI
c)     Hiểu biết về API các hệ thống quảng cáo Facebook, Google, Tiktok, Admob là một lợi thế
d)    Có kinh nghiệm thiết kế, xây dựng các mô hình dữ liệu, quy trình ETL, kho dữ liệu là một lợi thế
e)    Tư duy logic tốt, có khả năng phân tích, học hỏi nhanh
f)      Thành thạo cơ sở dữ liệu quan hệ (Relational SQL) và NoSQL: MySQL, MongoDB, PostgreSQL. Hiểu biết về Google BigQuery là một lợi thế.
g)    Kinh nghiệm với thiết kế data pipeline và các công cụ quản lý luồng dữ liệu: Airflow, Kafka, … là một lợi', "Why You'll Love Working Here Quyền lợi
a)      Mức lương: 1000$ – 1500$
b)      Hệ thống thưởng đa dạng: tháng (đột xuất), quý, năm, thưởng lương tháng 13, 14, 15... (theo kết quả doanh thu của Công ty).
c)      Phúc lợi tốt cho nhân viên và gia đình: bảo hiểm y tế, du lịch, team building, happy hour, happy birthday…
d)      Ứng viên khi trở thành nhân viên công ty sẽ được hưởng đầy đủ các chế độ của người lao động theo quy định của Luật lao động Việt Nam.
e)      Thưởng các dịp Lễ Tết: Tết Dương lịch, 08/03, 01/05, 02/09, 20/10, Trung thu...
f)       Bảo hiểm xã hội và bảo hiểm sức khỏe (PVI) theo chế độ Công ty; khám sức khỏe định kỳ.
g)      Quỹ du lịch Teambuilding 3 tháng/lần;
h)      Môi trường trẻ năng động, hiện đại, nhiều cơ hội phát triển bản thân.
i)        Chính sách đào tạo hấp dẫn nhằm phát triển kiến thức chuyên môn và hoàn thiện kỹ năng mềm toàn diện;
j)        Các chế độ khác theo chính sách nội bộ của công ty.
 Thời gian làm việc: 8 tiếng / ngày,
Sáng: 8:30 ~ 12:00 & Chiều: 13:00 ~ 17:30
Từ thứ Hai đến thứ Sáu
Ngày nghỉ và làm thêm: theo quy định của Luật lao động"]

column2:
['Top 3 Reasons To Join Us Dividends & internal shares program
Annual allowances for personal development & sport
20 days annual leave', "Job Description At GeoComply, our mission is to empower the future of digital trust. We operate at the center of a new generation of cybersecurity companies, leveraging today's geolocation data to make better risk-based decisions. Working as a critical piece of the security infrastructure for some of the world’s largest tech companies like DraftKings, FanDuel, the BBC, and Akamai, we are the global market leader for compliance-grade geolocation data and a critical piece of the decision engine. We have big plans in the next few years, including a targeted US IPO and various M&A opportunities.
At the heart of it all is people - we are deeply committed to creating and sustaining a world-class experience for our employees, customers, and partners.
We are looking for a Senior Data Analyst to join our team in HCMC, Vietnam who will match our ambitions, and help us Better ourselves and achieve our goals.

The Senior Data Analyst role contributes to GeoComply’s success by developing, enhancing rules for our products and providing quality analyses based on data collected from our end customers, as well as providing insights to help business and technical teams make informed decisions. This position reports and takes direction from Data Analytics Lead on a day-to-day basis.
In this role, you will:
Perform manual data analysis and visualization on live production data for detection of geolocation data anomalies and anti-fraud purposes
Design and script reports based on technical and business requirements.
Monitor release, configuration, and database changes.
Contribute to the growth of the team by suggesting ideas and new practices to improve manual review methodologies.
Develop and maintain a thorough understanding of the company’s technologies, processes, and teams
Understand the company’s vision, goals and strategy; actively contribute to the achievement of the goals and execution of the company’s strategy", "Your Skills and Experience Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Engineering, or similar majors.
Good command in Microsoft Excel
Strong knowledge of and proven experience with databases (SQL, MongoDB, etc), programming (Python or other languages), visualization tools (Power BI, Tableau, Kibana)
GIS experience is a plus
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
Enjoy working with numerical data
Minimum 4 years experience in a similar role
Ability to work in small collaborative teams in a dynamic working environment
Excellent written and spoken English
Good communication and interpersonal skills when working with the team
Strong technical skills, comfortable with Android, iOS, macOS, and Windows
Ability to analyze and interpret complex documents (software requirements and design specifications, standards, and regulations).
Ability to work under a tight timeline", "Why You'll Love Working Here Let us share why we think you’d love to work with us.
We have a track record of success and a vision and a plan for a promising future. GeoComply has close to 100% market share for player location regulatory compliance in the US gaming space. And we have fuelled that momentum with the expansion into new markets - media & entertainment and fintech.
We are proud of our values and we live them in all of our actions, conversations, and work.
#Build it Better, #Build it Bigger, #Build it Right
We are proud to be part of a global team that develops award-winning solutions for some of the world’s largest and most innovative companies.
We will support you on your learning journey. We invest in employee career growth and development. Our learning & development commitment includes leadership and technical development, a substantial budget for education and training, as well as dedicated work hours for self-study.
We care about our team. Our GeoComply team is talented, has a bias for action, and is known for their positive attitude and energy. Team members are generously rewarded with competitive salaries, incentives, and a comprehensive benefits package.
We care about giving back to the communities in which we live and work. GeoComply supports a  broad range of community initiatives through donations and employee volunteer activities.
We know that work can be fun. We take the time to create employee events and experiences where everyone can connect and celebrate.
Now What? Send us your resume and a cover letter. We Can’t Wait To Meet You.

At GeoComply, we live our value of building it right. Our workplace is built on mutual respect and inclusion. We know that diversity of experience and thought has led to connection, innovation, and our company’s success. We welcome applicants of all backgrounds, experiences, beliefs, and identities.
 "]

['Top 3 Reasons To Join Us Lương hấp dẫn tuỳ vị trí
Lương tháng 13 + thưởng
Cơ hội thăng tiến cao', 'Job Description - Tham gia lập trình và phát triển web/service bằng ngôn ngữ python
- Tham gia vào quá trình phân tích và thiết kế hệ thống
- Thu thập và xử lí các yêu cầu thiết kế và kĩ thuật;
- Tối ưu và nâng cấp mã nguồn để cải tiến hiệu quả, tăng độ ổn định và bảo mật
- Tìm hiểu yêu cầu, phân tích, thiết kế, nghiên cứu công nghệ công nghệ mới, đưa ra giải pháp áp dụng vào sản phẩm dịch vụ của công ty
- Duy trì và phát triển các website, code và cấu trúc dữ liệu có sẵn của công ty
 ', 'Your Skills and Experience - Có ít nhất 1 năm kinh nghiệm Python Django.
- Có kinh nghiệm AI, Machine Learning là một lợi thế.
- Có kinh nghiệm làm việc, thao tác với Git.
- Có kinh nghiệm lập trình python, sử dụng thành thạo một trong các framework như Flask, Django,…
- Có kinh nghiệm làm việc trên hệ điều hành Linux(Ubuntu), Window…
- Có kiến thức lập trình OOP, design pattern.
- Tư duy logic tốt, khả năng làm việc độc lập và làm việc nhóm.
- Có kiến thức tốt về RESTful service/ Web API.', "Why You'll Love Working Here - Mức lương thưởng cạnh tranh, hấp dẫn theo năng lực, trao đổi chi tiết trong buổi phỏng vấn.
- Chính sách premium insurance siêu xịn sò dành riêng cho Rikaier.
- Nhiều chương trình đào tạo hard/soft skills chất lượng và miễn phí trong công ty.
- Happy hour, CLB bóng đá, sinh nhật, trung thu, quốc tế thiếu nhi... siêu thú vị.
- Mỗi năm sẽ được đi du lịch xa 1 lần, có quỹ team building, company trip cho mỗi team.
- Môi trường làm việc năng động, chuyên nghiệp, teammate nhiệt tình.
- Công ty định hướng mở rộng quy mô lớn, cơ hội thăng tiến và phát triển bản thân cao."]

['Job Description - Analyze and understand business requirements and data models.
- Develop data pipelines/processing/storages/consuming to align with the business requirements and data models.
- Develop reports, applications and data queries to display data insights with high performance and within scheduled time.
- Document technical designs, reports, data queries, data models.
- Continue to provide improvements and optimizations on data pipelines/processing/storages/consuming.', 'Your Skills and Experience - 3 years or more in a similar role.
- Strong Python skills, shell scripting and Django experience.
- Experienced with data ingestion/storages such as AWS Kinesis, MySQL, AWS S3, AWS DynamoDB, AWS Redshift, etc.
- Experienced with data querying such as AWS Glue, Airflow, etc.
- Experienced with data processing such as EMR, Spark, Lambda, etc.
- Experienced with data-lake, data warehouse, data mart.
- Experienced with data querying such as Athena, SQL, etc.
- Experienced with BI/DA tools such as AWS Quicksights, PowerBI, Tableau, etc.
- Experienced with Programing languages: Python, Django.
- Ability to work independently, proactive problem solver.
- Willingness to troubleshoot and solve complex problems.
- Strong communication skills to effectively collaborate with others.
- Experienced with facebook data is a big plus.
- Experienced with chatbox.', "Why You'll Love Working Here - Competitive salary.
- Medical Insurance.
- Paid annual leave.
- Clear opportunities for promotion and career development.
- Company trip, team building and other community activitie"]

['Job Description - Work with the DevOps team to shape the architecture, design, and implementation of new and existing systems to enhance their reliability, performance, efficiency, and scalability
- Automate deployment and configuration processes
- Develop reliability tools and frameworks for DevOps team to use
- Drive efficiency in systems and processes: capacity planning, configuration management, performance tuning, monitoring and root cause analysis', 'Your Skills and Experience - 3 years or more in a similar role
- Strong Python skills, shell scripting and Django experience
- Good understanding of large-scale distributed systems in practice, including multi-tier architectures, application security, monitoring and storage systems
- Solid knowledge of cloud-based platforms (Azure, AWS, Google) and willingness to focus more deeply on AWS and Serverless technologies
- Gain knowledge of one or more of the following AWS CloudFormation, Kubernetes/ECS/EKS, Docker, Kafka/AWS Kinesis, Rancher/AWS Fargate, Microservices architecture, automated deployment and management tools applications are contained in the container.
- Good English skills and ability to communicate effectively with sales and technical teams.
- Ability to debug and analyze problems quickly
- Ability to learn quickly and apply new skills effectively
- Ability to multitask and attention to detail', "Why You'll Love Working Here - Health care insurance
- Annual health check
- 13th month salary
- Social insurance
- 15 days annual leave, with unused days carried over to the next year (unlimited)
- Technical and soft skills training on Udemy and Coursera
- Group outings, company parties and other exciting events quarterly
- Overtime is rarely required.
- At hSpace, we have a saying: together create the future. There are always startup opportunities and unlimited growth paths in hSpace."]

column2:
['Top 3 Reasons To Join Us Dẫn đầu thị trường
Cơ hội thử thách và phát triển bản thân
Môi trường làm việc năng động', 'Job Description Công ty An Ninh Mạng Viettel (VCS) là đơn vị tập trung thực hiện, nghiên cứu, phát triển chuyên sâu các sản phẩm, giải pháp An toàn thông tin, đồng thời cung cấp sản phẩm, dịch vụ ATTT cho các tổ chức doanh nghiệp lớn trong và ngoài nước. 
VCS đang tìm kiếm những nhân sự phù hợp gia nhập đại gia đình VCS, tham gia phát triển bản thân cùng những đồng nghiệp là chuyên gia hàng đầu trong lĩnh vực. Với môi trường trẻ cởi mở, năng động, sáng tạo, sẵn sàng tạo điều kiện cho các “chiến binh tiên phong” phát huy thế mạnh, vượt qua giới hạn của bản thân.   
Là DevOps Engineer tại VCS, bạn sẽ chịu trách nhiệm đóng gói, triển khai sản phẩm; chẩn đoán xác định các vấn đề trong vận hành sản phẩm và thực hiện tích hợp CI/CD trong vận hành, phát triển và kiểm thử.
Nhiệm vụ chính của bạn là : 
- Triển khai, cấu hình, khắc phục sự cố và làm việc với các nhóm triển khai hệ thống và giám sát hệ thống theo quy trình công việc được xác định trước.
- Thực hiện đóng gói giải pháp, quản lý cấu hình, thiết lập mô hình triển khai cho các ứng dụng, giải pháp.
- Làm việc trực tiếp với team phát triển để build và quản lý môi trường lập trình, kiểm thử, tích hợp CI/CD, thúc đẩy văn hoá DevOps trong team.
- Tích cực đóng góp ý kiến và nỗ lực để sản phẩm thành công.', 'Your Skills and Experience - Có kinh nghiệm làm việc với Docker, Git
- Có kinh nghiệm triển khai, áp dụng các hệ thống CI/CD như Jenkins, Gitlab CI, Github, ...
- Có kinh nghiệm làm việc, quản trị với các hệ thống Linux
- Có hiểu biết về các ngôn ngữ lập trình Python, bash script, ...
- Có hiểu biết về các giải pháp Container Orchestration như Kubernetes, Docker Swarm, Nomad, ... là một lợi thế
- Có kinh nghiệm sử dụng, triển khai hệ thống Cloud như OpenStack, Google Cloud, AWS, Azure, ... là một lợi thế
- Có hiểu biết về các giải pháp giám sát như Prometheus, Grafana, TICK Stack, ... là một lợi thế.
- Có kinh nghiệm triển khai, vận hành các hệ thống lớn, hiệu năng cao, các giải pháp HA/LB, Proxy, Service Mesh, Microservices, ... là một lợi thế.
- Có hiểu biết về bảo mật là một lợi thế.
- Kỹ năng giải quyết vấn đề tốt.', "Why You'll Love Working Here *Lý do nên gia nhập VCS
- Làm việc trong môi trường chuyên nghiệp, trẻ trung, hiện đại với nhiều cơ hội phát triển nghề nghiệp, nơi mọi ý tưởng đều được hoan nghênh
- Trang phục thoải mái, thời gian làm việc linh hoạt, không có phạt
- Package thu nhập hấp dẫn, thưởng thành tích hàng tháng, quý, năm
- Văn phòng hạng A, tầng cao view thoáng, ngắm trọn thành phố, luồng thang máy riêng
- Các câu lạc bộ công ty: Bóng bàn, Bóng đá, Pes, Bi-a, AOE, v.v. 
- Tận hưởng nhiều sự kiện của công ty, từ thi đấu thể thao, tiệc sinh nhật hàng tháng, xây dựng đội ngũ hàng quý đến tiệc năm mới, chuyến đi công ty, v.v. 
- Góc sách miễn phí với những cuốn sách chọn lọc 
- Miễn phí cà phê, trà. ..."]

['Top 3 Reasons To Join Us Comfortable Working Conditions
Interesting & Challenging Projects
Competitive Salary & Attractive Benefits', 'Job Description SIGN-ON BONUS will be offered to candidates who can join by October 15, 2021.
 RESPONSIBILITIES:
Code, implement, unit test, maintain and troubleshoot web application.
Comply with established coding quality standard of the project.
Integration of data services.
Work closely with QA team to ensure the project quality.
Participate in R&D, training, knowledge sharing activities.
Follow the project and organization processes, policies and regulations.
Ensure the assigned tasks to be performed on-time and with high quality.', 'Your Skills and Experience REQUIREMENTS:
Degree in Software Engineering, Information Technology or relevant.
At least 3 years of work experience in Python.
Able to extract datasets from ElasticSearch warehouse.
Can combine records with other data sources and then push them to either Google BigQuery or MySQL for use in the applications.
Familiar with GitLab CI.
Experienced in BigQuery and/or MySQL.
Good English skills.
Good time management, communication and problem-solving skills.
Good teamwork spirit and logical thinking.
Proactive, well self-organized and responsible in work.
Able to quickly manage new technologies.', "Why You'll Love Working Here Competitive salary depending on skills and capabilities;
13th salary plus 14th, 15th, 16th salary based on business performance.
Performance review twice a year;
Comfortable working conditions and flexible working time;
Good career growth opportunities with interesting and challenging projects;
English, technical and soft skills training courses;
Additional healthcare insurance and annual health check-up;
Light beverage and food are available all the time in the office;
Outdoor activities with company support: sport clubs, team building, happy hour party, birthday, company trip, staff and family events, etc."]

column2:
['Job Description We are looking for an experienced Fullstack Developer to play a key role in the development and maintenance of our B2B SaaS products. 
You will take full ownership of key modules of our product, making sure that they are robust, scalable and maintainable, and ready to support exponential growth in our customer base.
You should be able to develop new features from scratch, but also willing to get into existing code to add new capabilities and improve the quality. You will also assist in the deployment and management of applications on Google Cloud.
Your responsibilities will include: 
Actively participate in requirements analysis and design
Work with the frontend team, UI/UX designer and product management
Implement key product features for our B2B SaaS products, primarily using Python (backend) and React (front-end)
Write modular, reusable, well tested code and the associated internal documentation
Support the deployment of code to Google Cloud (GCP) and the implementation of robust management and monitoring tools to ensure maximum reliability of our services
Work with the rest of the development team to develop and document best practices, and ensure they are followed by code reviews and knowledge sharing
Support the QA team in creating thorough automated tests for all components
Facilitate Continuous Deployment from our GitHub code repositories to GCP', 'Your Skills and Experience You must have: 
A bachelor’s degree in computer science or a related study
4+ years of hands-on experience developing using Python and/or React
Experience with some or all of Celery, Django, Flask, Kafka, Beautiful Soup, MongoDB
Hands-on experience with GCP and/or AWS
Excellent written and spoken English
Experience working in an agile development environment using GitHub
Ability to diagnose and resolve problems independently, including consulting online resources and effectively asking the developer community for help
A strong desire to stay up to date with evolving standards, best practices and tools in cloud architecture
Ideally you will also have: 
Web scraping/crawling experience
Experience building micro services based architectures
Experience integrating with enterprise applications like Salesforce through REST APIs
Knowledge of the Sales and CRM domains
Experience with big data or related technologies', "Why You'll Love Working Here Remote work (40 working hours/week)

['Top 3 Reasons To Join Us A chance for you to take your ideas into effect
A chance for your limitless growing day by day
We are one of the few real technology companies', 'Job Description Responsibilities 
Design an evolutionary architecture for large scale systems with high scalability, high resilience (fail-tolerant), and high performance.
Resolve technical problems with a well-balanced solution (by balancing between multiple trade-offs within the given context of delivery time and resources)
Implement features with a high emphasis on code readability, scalability, modularity, and maintainability.
Benchmark and optimize API performance.
Collaborate with other teammates to deliver the best possible result as a team (result-focused and team-oriented).
Mentor junior backend engineers.
Actively research and apply the best practices that the world-class engineer team is using.', 'Your Skills and Experience Must-have:
5+years of experience in software development and 1+years of experience in using python-based web/rest api framework (Django, Flask, etc).
Have good knowledge and have great emphasis on data structure & algorithm and how things work under the hood (Engineers are not those who use technologies but those who build technologies).
Understand software design principles (Cohesion & coupling, modularity, SOLID principles, Package principles) and software architectural patterns.
Passionate in both creating products that customers love and building high-quality codebase.
Have good knowledge & experience in backend API performance optimization.
Good at english reading and writing skills.
Have good communication skills.
Have an open-minded, growth, and a proactive mindset.
Have high responsibility and ownership
Have excellent problem-solving skills.
Be a productivity geek (Always try to improve and optimize your own productivity).
Self-motivated
Nice-to-have:
Having experience working in startup, agile/scrum and product environment is a plus.
Having good interpersonal skills (Communication, Negotiation, Persuasion, Emotional Intelligence, Empathy, Conflict Resolution & Mediation) is a big plus.
Having contributions to open source projects is a big plus.', "Why You'll Love Working Here A successful qualified candidate will work with YouthDev team, develop and scale current business. We are using outsourcing and solution to make revenue and reinvest into our team ideas to break the world.
Interface with other team to incorporate their innovations and vice versa; Conduct design and code reviews; Analyze and improve efficiency, scalability, and stability of various system resources.
We are looking for not only a person who is a super IT developer but also a good business mindset who will be a very successful business man in the not too long distance future that don't want to have only a fixed salary every month in your whole life.
Remember, working at YouthDev means that you are developing products and roadmap for yourself not the company."]

column2:
['Top 3 Reasons To Join Us Building leading digital entertainment platforms
Open & multi-culture working environment
Highly competitive salary and benefits package', 'Job Description SUMMARY:
As a data engineer, your heart will beat faster when you see a data pipeline that does its job - extracting data from a wide variety of systems, transforming it automatically and making it available to all stakeholders. It is your responsibility to determine how raw data is processed in the company and which systems play the decisive role.
In close coordination with the Data Lead, you design storage and access concepts and serve a wide variety of consumers. You will master challenges regarding different data types, data quality and data sources.
JOB RESPONSIBILITIES:
Participate in a data engineering team which is responsible for POPS data landscape, including data architecture, data extraction and collection, data manipulation, feature engineering and other data-related product developments
Proactively perform research on related and/or assigned technologies, domains and techniques that are relevant to the practice or assigned by analytical leaders
Identify, design, and implement internal process improvements: automating manual processes, optimizing data delivery, re-designing infrastructure for greater scalability, etc.
Build scalable and reliable ETL pipelines and processes to assemble data from a large number and variety of data sources
Work with development team to enhance capabilities of internal analytics
Implement solutions and processes for management and governance across data quality metrics, metadata, lineage, data access rights and business definitions', 'Your Skills and Experience JOB REQUIREMENTS:
At least 3 years of experience in handling large data sets and working with structured, unstructured and datasets
Familiarity with database systems as Mongo, MySQL, PostgreSQL
Experience with SQL, Python, bash shell scripts Experience with Spark and its features: Spark SQL, Spark streaming, structured streaming
A degree or higher in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Information Technology or other related technical disciplines.
Strong data engineering intuitive: understanding different data structure from abstract to physical view
Experience in ML projects is a plus.', "Why You'll Love Working Here Flexible working hour, 12-16-day annual leaves.
Attractive annual bonus.
Premium health insurance for Team Lead/Manager/Director level.
Full insurances (health, social and unemployment) and competitive allowances (parking, transportation and telephone).
Free GYM service, team building budget, Happy-hour events and monthly activities
Company's congrats gifts on birthday, Wedding Day, Children's Day, Birth Deliver and other special occasions.
Opportunity to work in exciting and innovative/creative media projects."]

['Top 3 Reasons To Join Us We build a professional & fun working environment.

We develop the future-ready digital bank platform.', 'Job Description Having experiences with projects in financial institutions, digital banks, or fintech
Working with the Python (main), and advantages if also working with these stack Java/Kotlin, Typescript, Docker, Kubernetes, ELK Stack, AWS, Google Cloud, and other Cloud Technologies.
Following Agile software delivery framework
In client-facing integration, implementation engineering, or solution architecture roles, in B2B software product companies
Analyzing and validating business requirements, translating them into technical specifications/requirements.
Evaluating core platform changes versus client-specific requests.
Implementing Vault workflows and Python smart contract code from client requirements (Software Engineering).
Designing client solutions/architecture.
Collaborating with engineering, obtaining a deep technical understanding of Vault and associated roadmap.
Coordinating impact and requirements across projects.
Supporting client staging and development instances.
Understanding, investigating, resolving client technical queries.
Prioritizing and managing backlog and sprint planning.
Conducting post mortems and defect management on technical issues.
Participating in testing, release cycles, and QA processes relating to client deployments.', 'Your Skills and Experience Excellent problem-solving skills, ability to communicate solutions.
Ability to explain technical concepts to technical and non-technical stakeholders.
Experience writing software.
Experience analyzing requirements, creating specifications, and working with engineering functions to implement solutions.
Desire and ability to learn and work with engineers to evolve the technical aspects for technical solutions.', "Why You'll Love Working Here HR benefits
Competitive salary
Salary band per level and employee benefits are reviewed once per year
13th month salary pro rata depending on the employee’s length of service (within a calender year), paid with the December salary
Monthly lunch allowance: 700,000 VND/employee
Parking: GFT covers the monthly parking fee for employee motorbikes
Performance evaluation is once per year, for 2 purposes:
   > Performance bonus   > Salary increments
Talent retention policy (Retention bonus)
2-year anniversary = 0.5x monthly salary
3-year anniversary = 1x monthly salary
5-year anniversary = 2x monthly salary
Paid with salary of month of anniversary.
Health care
Private health insurance: including accident, outpatient, in-patient, maternity, and dental for all permanent employees who pass 2-month probation.
Optical: expense claim for eyewear
Annual health check-ups.
Vacation
Maximum 18-day vacation leave/year (with the ability to carry over 05 days till 31st March of the following year)
Adding one more annual leave day for each two-year anniversary.
Healthy lifestyle
Sports and hobby clubs: company has an annual fund for fitness activities, which is allocated per month as team’s vote.
Range of healthy snacks, tea, coffee, milk and beer on tap:
> Tea, coffee and milk are available at pantry area – WeWork
> Beer is available at pantry area – WeWork
> Snack is available in GFT office.
Social
Company townhall: each 6 weeks
Monthly team lunch at restaurants
Monthly team engagement activities: one activity per month
CSR activities: as per company’s CSR guideline and practice
Hackathon: once per year
Onsite tour/training courses at other GFT offices and client’s destination overseas (where applicable)."]

column2:
['Top 3 Reasons To Join Us Leading Technologies to Deliver Great Solutions
Enjoy Competitive & Employee-centric Compensation
Thrive in Diverse & Inclusive Working Environment', 'Job Description Wizeline partners with Fortune 500 companies and startups to provide intelligently designed software solutions with agile and distributed teams. Innovation in product development is at our core. We work towards goals, not checkboxes. We focus on impact. We are proud to contribute to local economies by developing technology ecosystems and giving back to the communities in which we operate.
Come join a team where all members are empowered to take ownership, raise their hands and bring inventive solutions to our partners’ toughest problems. We are engineering a better tomorrow, and creating new opportunities.
What you will bring to the team
Partner with multidisciplinary teams (Technical Writing, User Experience, Project Management, DevOps and Quality Assurance) to build scalable products from inception to completion. Solving challenging problems, working with cutting edge technology with the brightest minds in the industry.
Work as a Software Engineer in a distributed team.
We are proponents of ownership; expect to drive internal Wizeline initiatives and objectives, as well as build relationships with direct communication with customers/stakeholders.', 'Your Skills and Experience Must have:
Solid experience with C# and .NET or Python 3 (2 is acceptable)
Strong SQL skills and experience with LINQ (for C#)
Experience with Flask or FastAPI (for Python)
Comfortable in learning new coding languages and frameworks, and seamlessly switching from one to another, when required.
Good knowledge of algorithms and data structures
Decent communication skills in English.
Nice to have:
BS/MS in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related subject.
Experience with key packages and tools such as NuGet, OpenWrap.
Experience with NumPy, Pandas, Keras, or other major ML/Data packages.
Experience with cloud computing and running C# on cloud providers, especially AWS and Azure.
Experience with performance and memory profiling.
Experience with front-end technologies such as mobile development, Angular, or React.', "Why You'll Love Working Here Our culture: We offer exceptional career growth opportunities to our employees with skill development workshops, mentoring programs, and support for side projects or entrepreneurial work.
Our benefits and perks: We offer competitive compensation and employee-centric benefits, including catered meals for breakfast and lunch, wellness programs, and international training opportunities across Wizeline offices.
Our global family: We offer a work abroad program, as well as language training and immigration support for our expat members."]

column2:
['Top 3 Reasons To Join Us Sign on bonus to all level (*)
Great healthcare packages
20 paid leave days and 7 paid sick days per year', 'Job Description As a Data Engineer you will build data pipelines to transform raw data into business insights. You will work with Product Managers, Designers and other Engineers in a cross-functional team focused on designing internal analytics solutions, to champion our internal data and assist colleagues in making data driven decisions.
You will be responsible for delivering performant, scalable solutions that meet the growing needs of our largest customers. You are able to clearly determine business requirements, model the underlying business domain and create documentation that other team members can leverage.
Responsibilities
Day to Day
Develop algorithms and solutions to our data analytics problems.
Develop metrics to measure the outcome/impact of your introduced solutions
Develop and maintain APIs to support other teams in retrieving metrics
Assisting in driving squad sprint execution to ensure timelines are met without compromising on quality.
Anticipates and communicates blockers or delays for their work (or their squads) before they require escalation.
Technical Duties
Consistently writes production-ready code that is easily testable, easily understood by other engineers, and accounts for edge cases and errors.
Provides technical advice and weighs in on technical discussions / decisions that impact their team.
Ensures their commitments are realistic, understands their priority and urgency, and delivers upon them accordingly.
Communication & Leadership Duties
Communicate with our business and technical teams in an effective, clear, concise manner in both written and verbal form to understand the analytics requirements.
Helps their fellow team members overcome obstacles, resolve blockers, and complete work tasks.
Contribute to technical documentation such as technical design and as built documents', 'Your Skills and Experience Preferred candidates will have good knowledge of algorithms, data structures, and data warehousing concepts.
Preferred candidates will have knowledge of BI technologies, methodologies, and their application is a plus
Preferred candidates will have experience with AWS particularly AWS Glue
Familiar with Agile/Scrum development with sprints
Minimum Qualifications:
Have a minimum of 2 years of professional working experience as a data engineer.
Must be proficient in either Python, Scala, Spark or NodeJS
Must have strong written and oral English language communication skills', "Why You'll Love Working Here Fun, creative and fast-paced working environment
Competitive salary
13th Month Bonus
MacBook Pro (16-inch, 2019) provided
7 paid sick days per year
20 paid leave days per year
12 public holidays per year
Stock Options/ Equity
Kitchen stocked with snacks & drinks
Paid Parental Leave
Learning & Development Stipend
Employee Referral Bonus
Our offices have creative, open workspaces with room to play, reflect, and relax
Our team is extremely competitive, and we will challenge your best table tennis skills"]

Có cơ hội được làm viêc tại Nhật bản', 'Job Description Tham gia các dự án xây dựng phát triển các phần mềm Web, App (ứng dụng mobile, Desktop), giao diện liên quan đên AI/Machine learning.
Phân tích yêu cầu của người dùng và xây dựng, triển khai chức năng của sản phẩm hệ thống.
Hỗ trợ xây dựng các plugin và API dựa trên nền tảng AI và machine learning
Trực tiếp tham gia và xây dựng sản phẩm chiến lược cho công ty.
Lập kế hoạch và quản lý công việc của các thành viên trong đội.
Giám sát quá trình làm việc và đánh giá kết quả công việc.', 'Your Skills and Experience Có ít nhất 3 năm kinh nghiệm làm fullstack.
Có kinh nghiệm chuyên sâu ít nhất một trong các ngôn ngữ lập trình (Nodejs/ Python).
Có ít nhất 2 năm kinh nghiệm với Reactjs hoặc Vuejs.
Có  kinh nghiệm  thiết kế và xây dựng cơ sở dữ liệu với Mysql/SQL Server/Mongodb.
Có tư duy logic tốt, có kỹ năng đọc hiểu và phân tích yêu cầu kỹ thuật khách hàng đặt ra.
Có khả năng quản lý team, lên kế hoạch và phân chia task cho từng thành viên trong team.
Có kinh nghiệm làm việc với Linux system hoặc các nền tảng điện toán đám mây AWS/AZURE/Google Cloud… là lợi thế', "Why You'll Love Working Here Làm việc 5 ngày/ tuần và không có overtime

BHXH theo quy định của nhà nước và bảo hiểm chăm sóc sức khỏe PVI

Happy hour 3-4 lần /tuần
Tại sao bạn nên chọn Aimenext?
Một môi trường làm việc chuyên nghiệp, năng động
Được đào tạo về chương trình công nghệ thông tin

Lập kế hoạch theo tuần/ tháng và báo cáo định kỳ về tiến độ của dự án.', 'Your Skills and Experience Có dưới 1 năm kinh nghiệm về Backend.

['Top 3 Reasons To Join Us Attractive Salary and Benefits
Amazing Clients
Product driven company', "Job Description Orange logic is a US software company (California)  with offices in France and Vietnam.
The company’s product is a web application designed to manage large collections of digital assets (photos, videos, audio, documents...) Leading organizations like the BBC, United nations & Reuters... have adopted it for its unique flexibility.
We are hiring software engineers to build new functionalities for Cortex, our digital asset management software.
As an engineer in our Integration team, you will collaborate with architects, developers, security specialists to solve complex client's challenges. Specifically, you will design and code software programs, APIs and microservices to integrate best-of-breed technologies used by multiple stakeholders.
As examples, here are some projects you may be involved with: Allow Cortex users to view assets in 3D, bring video transcoding in Cortex...", 'Your Skills and Experience You have a software engineering background and a broad knowledge of web development (this allows you to quickly understand new tools, framework and programming languages)
You enjoy building projects from scratch, and it shows in your rich projects portfolio (pro & perso)
You have significant experience as a full-stack engineer (strong back-end abilities and decent front-end skills)
You master at least one popular programing language like Javascript (React, Angular...) or Python
You work fast with little guidance but without missing any important details
You enjoy  exploring new tools, libraries and technologies
Your command of English  is enough to interact with foreigners', "Why You'll Love Working Here BENEFITS

Very attractive salary package depending on the profile

Môi trường Chuyên Nghiệp, Năng Động, Trẻ Trung', 'Job Description - Giải quyết các vấn đề thuật toán và các bài toán NP
- Làm việc với các bộ phận nội bộ (nhóm làm sản phẩm, thiết kế, bán hàng) hoặc các khách hàng, nhóm hợp tác bên ngoài để đảm bảo hoạt động của dự án
- Đề xuất và phát triển những tính năng chất lượng cao để tăng tốc độ, quy mô và khả năng sử dụng
- Đảm bảo kiến trúc nền tảng có khả năng mở rộng, luôn sẵn có và thiết thực để đáp ứng mức độ dịch vụ được cam kết
- Xử lý xuyên suốt quá trình phát triển phần mềm, chẩn đoán và sửa chữa các vấn đề gặp phải
- Các công việc khác theo chỉ đạo của cấp trên', 'Your Skills and Experience - Có kinh nghiệm/niềm yêu thích về thuật toán cổ điển và giải quyết các bài toán NP (lời giải tối ưu không xác định được trong thời gian tuyến tính)
- Thành thạo một số ngôn ngữ phổ biến như C++, Java; ưu tiên biết Python, TypeScript/JavaScript, Scala/Java; có khả năng học nhanh ngôn ngữ lập trình mới
- Quen thuộc với cơ sở dữ liệu SQL, ưu tiên biết NO-SQL (Not-Only SQL), các hệ thống phân tích dữ liệu lớn (Big Data) là một lợi thế
- Đam mê giải quyết các bài toán khó, tối ưu hóa các giải thuật
- Tiếng anh tốt là một lợi thế, có khả năng đọc hiểu tài liệu tiếng anh', "Why You'll Love Working Here CHẾ ĐỘ ĐÃI NGỘ

column2:
['Top 3 Reasons To Join Us Reshape the Future of Banking
Top Salary, Smartest Colleagues
Awesome Benefits', "Job Description Trusting Social is an AI Fintech company specialized in assessing credit profiles of consumers in emerging markets combining pioneering AI with large alternative data sources. In 2020 we reached our ambitious milestone of credit profiling 1 billion consumers spanning 4 countries - Vietnam, Indonesia, India & the Philippines - and building a platform for the wider industry and the financial services industry in particular to provide the 'un & under' served access to credit. At the core of this initiative has been our strict and unwavering adherence to the norms of consumer data privacy and consumer data rights.
But we're not satisfied as we embark on the next leg of our journey to deliver 100 million credit lines to consumers in the markets where we operate. Although this goal is ambitious, we truly believe that by harnessing the power of AI & Big Data we can deliver financial access at unprecedented scale.
As a firm, we're audacious problem solvers motivated by our impact on society. We deeply espouse the values of ownership - of our actions and initiatives, integrity in all we do and agility in execution.
We place great importance on doing what is right, what is best and what is innovative. If you are smart, driven and want to make a difference in the world with the most advanced and fascinating technology, come join our team. We can satisfy your desire to explore new territory and give you the runway to really make an impact. 
How you will make an impact in this role
We are partnering with banks which are embracing changes toward digital banking. These changes are exciting but complex, and we are looking for 03 experienced platform engineers who are motivated by big challenges and are ready to dive headlong into helping us grapple with complexity, build solutions and turn our visions into a reality. 
What will you do
Research technology, build scalable engineering products, support internal teams to increase developer’s productivity and experience.
Experiment new methods of microservices deployment / communication / scalability.
Work with Backend Engineering Teams to maintain, ship new product features for multi platforms.
Work with SRE Team to maintain and improve multi infrastructures by automation tools.
Be on-call, solve production incidents and support monitoring / observability.
Think out of the box, innovate, experiment, continuously improve, fail fast and learn as you go in an effort to provide simple yet effective solutions to complex problems", 'Your Skills and Experience 2+ years of software development, devops and delivery experience. We also welcome strong candidate having fewer years of experience.
Preferably with 1+ year of experience in Go, Python.
Understanding DevOps principles, CI/CD process, Git.
Understanding Networking, Operating System.
Knowledge of System Design, REST/gRPC.
Knowledge of Database management system (MariaDB / MySQL / Redis).
Knowledge of data structures, algorithms, object-oriented design.
Knowledge about designing and building Microservices architecture.
Experience in using Containerization (Docker / Containerd), Orchestrators (Kubernetes / Nomad).
Nice to have: Experience in auto-scaling techniques.', "Why You'll Love Working Here Work and learn from one of the best and brightest technology teams in Vietnam
Be part of a winning team with exponential growth regionally, experience recruiting world-class talents
Work directly with top level managers and learn from the international group of experts
Enjoy many company retreats in Vietnam and other countries
Generous comprehensive optional health insurance package for family
Free premium gym membership
Free Grab to work
Housing allowance if moved closer to office"]

column2:
['Top 3 Reasons To Join Us Competitive salary package
Unlimited sick leave and official holidays
Premium healthcare coverage for you & family', 'Job Description We are seeking Backend Engineers who will make responsible:
Develop with e-commerce conversion rate as top priorities
Produce fully applications writing clean code and be able to maintain
Optimize API performance to speed up the time response,
Create the automation systems for e-commerce ecosystems
Develop microservice system
Help design the architecture, own development of major initiatives and modules
Work in cross functional teams with product managers, UX designers and FE engineers to ship software on-quality and on-time
Help level up the team; share knowledge, conduct code and design review; drive code quality and process improvement initiatives', 'Your Skills and Experience Qualifications & Requirements
2+ years of working experience in E-commerce System with more than 50,000 active users
4+ years of working Golang, Python
Expert in both relational database MySQL, Postgresql and NoSQL (Cassandra, MongoDB)
Familiarity with Microservices Architecture and Event Driven Systems mindset
Expert in working with Automation and Monitoring Systems: Grafana, Kibana
Experience in integration of Payment Gateway (Paypal, Credit card, Amazon pay) and Logistics systems (UPS, Fedex…)
Experience in publish/subscribe messaging system: kafka, google pub/sub, firebase,...
Experience in configuring services such as Memcache, Redis, …
Experience making a load test with common tools: JMeter, Vegeta, locust, etc., or in-built load test tools
Knowledge with ERP system
Knowledge with DevOps and containerization using Docker or Kubernetes, CI/CD and git flow', "Why You'll Love Working Here Why you’ll love working here
You be you.  We deeply care about helping everyone at Autonomous work on what they love, freely express their ideas within the organization, and grow to to their true potential.
You be a better you.  Most of the time, you’ll be working on cutting edge technologies.  You’ll be constantly learning and improving your knowledge as an engineer, researcher or scientist.
You are your own boss.  There is very little hierarchy at Autonomous.  Decision making processes are transparent and open to vote. We welcome all different ways of thinking and trust the people we work with to do what they do best. There is no micromanagement here.
You the inventor.  Most of the time, you’ll find yourself working on a problem that doesn’t have a solution - yet. That’s where you come in.
Solve problems for the world, not just Vietnam. Most of the problems we’re solving are for the global audience of today, and of tomorrow.
The essentials
Competitive salary package
Open dynamic working environment with stunning colleagues
Light breakfasts, healthy lunches, and hearty dinners
Unlimited sick leave, official holidays, and at least 12 paid days off per year
Full medical and dental coverage for you and 50% for your family
Powerful laptop, monitor, standing desk, and any accessories you need to do your best work
Free access to a wide variety of online courses"]

column2:
['Top 3 Reasons To Join Us We are the pioneer in an UNIQUE AI market
We are OPEN in sharing your own working styles
We have a TOP-TIER team of talented people', 'Job Description Position Description
As a critical role in Science’s success, we are looking for a Backend Developer to join our team who is expected to build, scale, optimize and deploy highly complex system architecture. The position is the backbone of our product development.
This is an exciting opportunity for those who enjoy R&D and be challenged and grow in the field of AI-First software / product development. Along the way this role will contribute to game-changing products for the multi-trillion-dollar industry.
 Responsibilities and Performance Objectives:
Design & build APIs to integrate AI solutions into proof-of-concept products for prospective clients.
Maintaining and releasing AI models to integrate into client products.
Participate in developing internal products to help members from other departments improve their workflow and productivity.
Collaborate with AI engineers and researchers to help them resolve technical challenges.
Collaborate with Delivery to gather requirements from internal teams, as well as external clients.', 'Your Skills and Experience Skills and Experience Required:
At least 2 years of experience in developing, testing, debugging, and troubleshooting with Python, especially in building backend services.
Good understanding of coding practices: Design pattern, SOLID principles.
Solid understanding of computer science concepts: time complexity, algorithms
data structures.
Familiar with developing REST APIs, authentication & authorization using JWT/OAuth2, SQL/NoSQL databases.
Self-motivated, problem solving and creative thinking.
Fluent in English, good communication skills and a good team player.
Git hooks and workflows.
Familiar with Docker, CI tools (CircleCI, etc.)
 Our current tech stacks:
Infrastructure: Multi-cloud (AWS, GCP, Azure), On-Premise.
CI/CD & Automation: Ansible, Terraform, Docker, Circle CI, Codacy.
Application layers: Python, Shell.
Package installer: helm, dvc.
Distributed systems: RabbitMQ, ES, Kafka.
Databases: Redis, MySQL, PostgreSQL
Observability stack: Grafana + Prometheus + Loki, ELK, Tracing.
Security: OWASP Top 10, IAP, CIS.', "Why You'll Love Working Here The chance to work on COOL world-class projects!

We’re not an academic research institute. We’re a global AI product company. Our focus is to create applicable AI products which can bring huge impact to users. In order to do so, our solutions is the combination of innovative AI core technology and solid business understanding. There are 3 main categories:

Image Processing
Voice Recognition
Natural Language Processing

How is our working environment?

We strongly believe that go-global ambition requires international-standard members. Cinnamon will create the best environment for all members to grow toward that goal.

#Grit: Ability to stay extremely persistent toward the goal. 
#StretchYouself: Actively learn and take new opportunity in the area of knowledge
and experience that you don’t have before. 
#Leadership-drivenTeamwork: Proactively seek for mutual understanding in any
collaboration.

What we will return
- Salary range is above the market
- Laptop provided. GPU, AWS all be ready for model training
- An open, flexible and collaborative working environment
- Happy Monday, Book Club, English Club, Company Trip, Teambuilding activities with free snack and drink
- We mostly focus on talent development
- Knowledge sharing sessions from internal and external Experts
- 1 day off & 3 days working online monthly"]

column2:
['Top 3 Reasons To Join Us A product company with strong engineering culture
Clear career path for individuals
Encourage citizenship and employee engagement', "Job Description As a Odoo Developer at Teko, together we shape our product. In doing so, you'll face a huge amount of challenges that you may not have a chance to face in any other companies out there. They are:
Design and develop Odoo modules for customed business of warehouse management, and integrate with other microservices in the omni-channel retail system.
Customize Odoo core to optimize system performance, reliability and traceability.
You will be part of an agile team, working closely with product managers, designers and technical leads to ideate, prototype, build and test new products or features. In short, you take ownership of your work and lead the effort from architecture, implementation, deployment and testing.
Writing clean and reusable code with unit / functional tests and continually increasing your code quality.
Having lots of discussions, brainstorming with your team to make technical decisions.
Spending lots of time reviewing other people’s code so you will learn and understand every piece of the system and making sure we have the best code quality as a team.
Constantly raise your standard, learning new things and sharing knowledge with the rest of the team. We believe it’s more meaningful when we grow as a team.
Taking ownership of the product and constantly finding ways to make it better by improving the design, system maintainability, performance and reliability. You will also monitor and troubleshoot application or system issues by deep diving into technical problems. This requires you to understand the whole application and infrastructure stack.
         ---------- Interview online via Google Hangouts -----------", 'Your Skills and Experience BS in Computer Science or similar field of study.
2+ years of Software Development, ideally ERP development experience (Odoo, etc.)
Proficient in Python programming language.
Experience in integration of third party applications using any web service
Have good knowledge about computer science, data structures, algorithms.
Good to have: Experience with designing and building high traffic applications to serve millions of users.
Good to have: Experience with devops automation tools, CI/CD.
Good to have: Experience with containerization technologies such as Docker, Kubernetes.', "Why You'll Love Working Here Negotiable salary according to qualification (13th-month salary + Performance Bonus) ;
02 months probation with 100% of Gross salary;
The working environment is open, energetic, and professional. More opportunities for career promotion;
Free Food & Drink: lunch, fresh fruit/cake, coffee & tea.
Premium healthcare: full benefit with social insurance, annual health check, and attractive PTI healthcare coverage under the company’s own policy;
Employee Relationship: company trip,  team bonding & sports club;
Leave Paid: 12 days for annual leave & 6 days for sick leave (max 18 days)
Working time: Monday to Friday (8:30 AM – 5:30 PM).
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
VNLIFE is the newest and second unicorn of Vietnam although its name is relatively unknown to most consumers. 
Aside from its VNPAY-QR network, which is integrated in more than 30 mobile banking apps and available for payment in nearly 100.000 shops across Vietnam, and its diversified portfolio companies in new retails (Phong Vũ, Sói Biển, Vnshop.vn) and online travel (My tour, Tripi, DinoGo), VNLIFE is also a big player in providing technology solutions for both banks and merchants of all sizes. 
Part of the VNLIFE ecosystem (vnlife.vn), Teko Vietnam was incorporated in January 2017 with the motto: Simplify multi-channel retailing with technology. Led by an accomplished leadership team, Tekoers work and grow together, with the current goal of developing solutions and O2O tech products for E-Commerce such as Omni-Channel Retail and Logistics. 
About us:
Teko is a product company. Our engineers take part in every stage of our product lifecycle. Focusing on enhancing the user experience, we continuously study new product designs, practise code readability, improve system performance and reliability. 
We foster a great engineering culture. No individual owns every great idea! Every Tekoer is given opportunities to contribute their feedback, share their product ideas and see their ideas to fruition. We invest in Teko’s long-term growth. It’s not good enough to get things done, but get things done right!
We embrace a strong data-driven culture. We discuss, make decisions and build products based on data and insights. Our current success has been the result of efficiency improvement and cost-cutting solutions for our partners in e-commerce, payment and logistics. "]

column2:
['Top 3 Reasons To Join Us Leading Technologies to Deliver Great Solutions
Enjoy Competitive & Employee-centric Compensation
Thrive in Diverse & Inclusive Working Environment', 'Job Description Wizeline partners with Fortune 500 companies and startups to provide intelligently designed software solutions with agile and distributed teams. Innovation in product development is at our core. We work towards goals, not checkboxes. We focus on impact. We are proud to contribute to local economies by developing technology ecosystems and giving back to the communities in which we operate.
Come join a team where all members are empowered to take ownership, raise their hands and bring inventive solutions to our partners’ toughest problems. We are engineering a better tomorrow, and creating new opportunities.
What you will bring to the team
Partner with multidisciplinary teams (Technical Writing, User Experience, Project Management, DevOps and Quality Assurance) to build scalable products from inception to completion. Solving challenging problems, working with cutting edge technology with the brightest minds in the industry.
Work as a Software Engineer in a distributed team.
We are proponents of ownership; expect to drive internal Wizeline initiatives and objectives, as well as build relationships with direct communication with customers/stakeholders.', 'Your Skills and Experience Must have:
Experience with Python 3 (2 is acceptable)
Experience with cloud computing and running Python on AWS (EC2, Lambdas, S3)
Strong SQL skills and experience with LINQ
Experience with Flask or FastAPI
Comfortable in learning new coding languages and frameworks, and seamlessly switching from one to another, when required.
Good knowledge of algorithms and data structures
Decent communication skills in English.
Nice to have:
Experienced working with C# and .NET technologies
BS/MS in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related subject.
Experience with key packages and tools such as NuGet, OpenWrap.
Experience with performance and memory profiling.
Experience with front-end technologies such as mobile development, Angular, or React.', "Why You'll Love Working Here Our culture: We offer exceptional career growth opportunities to our employees with skill development workshops, mentoring programs, and support for side projects or entrepreneurial work.
Our benefits and perks: We offer competitive compensation and employee-centric benefits, including catered meals for breakfast and lunch, wellness programs, and international training opportunities across Wizeline offices.
Our global family: We offer a work abroad program, as well as language training and immigration support for our expat members.
#AllAreWelcomeHere
Having an inclusive environment is serious business at Wizeline. Wizeline creates and fosters a diverse, inclusive, and harassment-free workplace in which all can achieve their potential. All applicants will be considered for employment regardless of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, veteran, or disability status.
Please note that by submitting your application, you agree with the terms and conditions of our Privacy Policy."]

column2:
['Top 3 Reasons To Join Us Top-notch compensation and engaging perks
Cool technologies and fascinating products
Flexible work hours and unlimited leave plan', 'Job Description Parcel Perform is looking for an amazing team member to support us in Software engineering! 
You have good web development skills, many experiences in Back-end development, you’re technically savvy, and have a nice grasp on coding techniques? Are you also interested in e-commerce and like to take on new challenges? Help us drive Parcel Perform’s growth and join our team! We are looking for you!
WE NEED YOU ON OUR TEAM!
As a backend engineer, you will be building scalable systems with microservices. You will get to write codebases that are small and focused on doing one thing well. We choose microservices for technology freedom, resilience, and scalability, though there will be a lot of communication between services, much automation and tons of metrics we need to keep an eye on.
Such a system isn’t easy, especially with a focus on good engineering practices. But that is ok. We aren’t here for ease anyway. We are here for people who want to operate at the next level in their careers.', 'Your Skills and Experience WHAT YOU SHOULD BRING ALONG!
We at Parcel Perform believe in innovation, energy, and resourcefulness for everything we do. We will not stop delivering an outstanding product that we can be proud of and need you to help us to inform the world. You need to feel the same way about our offering and bring along the following things:
The skills
2 - 10 years of experience in Software development,
Solid knowledge of Backend (preferably Python)
Knowledge of scaling practices such as in-memory databases, load balancing, caching, etc.
Comfortable with both SQL and NoSQL databases
Know-how of any MQ as a communication hub. If you start one today, that still counts.
Comfortable RESTful and real-time communication protocols.
Familiar with AWS stack to get the most out of infrastructure.
Eager to get involved in the data engineering process
Experience in front-end development using Javascript is a plus
Wide exposure to multiple technology stacks is an advantage, we love full-stack guys.
English communication is a must.
The mindset
Be responsible for tasks and open discussion, giving questions to build up high-quality products and rich front-end experiences for our users.
Understand clearly object-oriented programming and design pattern.
Willing to learn and research new technology or jump out of your comfort zone.
Passionate about quality and the design of the code, productivity of the work, and maintainability of the result.', "Why You'll Love Working Here WHAT YOU WILL RECEIVE IN RETURN!
The competitive compensation package, and a preference for internal promotions.
Unlimited leave plan
Flexible working hours, and an open environment.
Premium insurance and annual medical checkup
Free lunch, free fruit, snacks are provided.
Weekly 1-1 catch-up for training and career development, team bonding events, various training programs.
Unlimited to O’Reilly technical materials.
Opportunities to work alongside people from around the world that share the same passion and dedication.
Our office in Ho Chi Minh City makes work-life integration to the fullest, located in a quiet area with little traffic, full of natural light, and within walking distance to many convenient facilities."]

['Top 3 Reasons To Join Us Teambuilding hàng năm
Lớp học nâng cao trình độ
Tối thiểu 13 tháng lương', 'Job Description Tham gia phát triển các dự án, hệ thống quản lý.
Thực hiện và phối hợp công việc theo nhóm dưới sự phân công của quản lý dự án.', 'Your Skills and Experience Yêu cầu bắt buộc:
Có hiểu biết cơ bản về cơ sở dữ liệu và hệ thống.
Có kiến thức về lập trình hướng đối tượng.
Có kinh nghiệm làm việc với ngôn ngữ lập trình Python > 6 tháng.
Có kinh nghiệm làm việc với cơ sở dữ liệu No-SQL: MongoDB, Cassandra, ElasticSearch,…
Yêu cầu khác:
Có khả năng đọc hiểu tài liệu tiếng Anh.
Có tư duy lập trình tốt, khả năng nắm bắt nhanh công nghệ.
Có khả năng phối hợp theo nhóm tốt.
Năng động, sáng tạo, nhiệt tình và chịu được áp lực cao trong công việc.', "Why You'll Love Working Here Mức lương lên đến $1.200, tuỳ kinh nghiệm và kỹ năng làm việc.
Package lương: 13 tháng lương cố định/năm, có thể có thêm thưởng hiệu quả chung vào cuối năm tuỳ vào tình hình kinh doanh. Có cơ hội được đánh giá điều chỉnh thu nhập tối thiếu 01 lần/năm, các vị trí mới jonior/normal tốc độ đánh giá, điều chỉnh thu nhập sẽ thường xuyên hơn: 6 tháng/lần.
Làm việc cùng với những người có 8-10 năm kinh nghiệm trong lĩnh vực software, ở vị trí Software Architect.
Có cơ hội làm những việc thách thức, phát huy hết khả năng bản thân.
Được định hướng phát triển chuyên sâu về công nghệ.
Đảm bảo khả năng đào tạo, chia sẻ kinh nghiệm từ các Team Leader.
Đóng bảo hiểm y tế, bảo hiểm xã hội theo quy định của Nhà nước.
Nghỉ Lễ, Tết, ốm đau, hiếu, hỉ, thai sản... theo quy định của Nhà nước.
Được hưởng các CHẾ ĐỘ PHÚC LỢI của công ty: nghỉ mát hàng năm, thể thao, TeamBuilding, các lớp học nâng cao trình độ (chuyên môn, tiếng Anh…)
Thời gian làm việc từ: 8h30 - 18h00 (các ngày từ Thứ hai đến Thứ Sáu và thứ Bảy đầu tiên của tháng)."]

Continuous learning and evolution opporturnities
Opportunity to start or boost your career', "Job Description Hi ! We are building a new brilliant team, working with international clients and their engineers team. It's time to step in and become our first core members of this great journey. We are looking for Sr. Backend Developer (Python)  JOIN US NOW. Here are several points of your awesome scope of work:
Work together with other team members (FE, QC and Manager), be responsible for the whole lifecycle of an application or service, from conception, specification, development, testing, support, bug fixing

column2:
['Top 3 Reasons To Join Us Salary is up to $1,500
Review salaries every 6 months
Provide MacBook Air or Pro', 'Job Description Researching & developing solutions in ML/DL field.
Analyzing and understanding customer problems to convert these insights into system requirements
Working with experienced software engineers to develop and implement AI Model', 'Your Skills and Experience Requirements 
1+ year experience in AI field
Good at mathematics and basic understanding of data science
Experience with computer vision and machine learning
Analytic, problem-solving skills and an ability for self-study
Ability to discuss & report in English
Plus
Strong programming skills with Python & C++ knowledge a plus.
Ability to implement AI models in web / mobile apps
Speaking English fluently', "Why You'll Love Working Here 04 reasons why you will love to work here:
●  SALARY: can be up to ~ $ 1,500 depending on your performance and it will be reviewed every 6 months.
There is an exception to get a higher salary (Achieve Kaggle Master / Be promoted to become specialist or management layer)
●  YOUR BENEFITS:
+  The 13th salary, parties & other HR benefits as internal company policy.
+  Social Insurance, yearly health checking & good annual holidays.
● WORKING ENVIRONMENT:
+  Office is an individual French villa.
+  130 staff (13 Japanese staff + 1 UK working together at the HCM office).

● CHANCE TO BECOME HIGH VALUE ENGINEER:

+ You will be a higher value engineer with a stable career with dynamic promotion & job opportunities."]

['Top 3 Reasons To Join Us Attractive Salary and Benefits
Amazing Clients
Product driven company', "Job Description Orange logic is a US software company based in California, with international offices in France and Vietnam. 
The company's flagship product is a web-based application designed to manage large-scale media libraries (photos, videos, audio files, documents…). As a direct result of 15+ years of independent R&D, Cortex is the most flexible DAM on the market and the solution chosen by Airbnb, The BBC, United Nations & Reuters to manage their large digital assets libraries.
With no external investors to please, Orange Logic has the rare freedom to pursue its unique product vision focused on users while growing at a fast pace.
As a part of our happy team, you will have the opportunity to focus on the aspects of the job that you enjoy the most. Specifically, you will: 
Developing scalable new features for our software product that exceeds our customer’s needs
Building architecture for our platform to ensure optimal performance
Obtaining requirement feedback from internal teams/clients to maintain/support the product development
Write the Unit Tests for robust development
Performing code reviews on other team member’s work
Taking ownership of projects and having the opportunity to further your knowledge by exploring machine learning, security, DevOps, and more", 'Your Skills and Experience To be a successful candidate for this role, you should have:
A Bachelor’s Degree in any relevant major (e.g. Information Technology, Computer Science, etc.)
Proficiency in English (both verbal and written)
3+ years’ practical experience on a web-based application
Proficiency with any backend programming languages (e.g. C#, Java, Python, JavaScript, etc)
A strong fundamental understanding of software development
An understanding of complex algorithms and data structures, as well as a passion for intellectual challenges
Strong self-discipline for delivering well-tested, complete features/modules under a tight schedule and the capability for rational thinking
Experience with the database management tool SQL is a plus, but not mandatory', "Why You'll Love Working Here As a full-time employee, you are eligible for our benefits program: 
Very attractive salary package depending on the profile
Monthly performance bonus (up to 2K$ / month for top performers)
18 days of annual leaves (cashback if not used)
13th-month salary
And also: 
Multiple allowances (lunch, gym, parking, birthday/Tet/wedding voucher... )
Full social and unemployment insurances
Premium healthcare insurance
Monthly team-building & special celebrations on Autumn Festival, Halloween, Christmas, Tet, ...
Happy hours every day with free snacks, soft drinks, fruit, and coffee"]

['Top 3 Reasons To Join Us Công ty hàng đầu
Công việc tốt
Cơ hội thăng tiến và phát triển', 'Job Description Mục Tiêu:
Thiết kế, triển khai và đánh giá các biện pháp sử dụng nền tảng đám mây, đảm bảo giải pháp đưa ra phù hợp với luật và chính sách bảo mật của TCB
Trách nhiệm chính
1. Quản lý và điều hành công việc:
- Phân tích nhu cầu của các đơn vị và giúp họ lựa chọn công nghệ đám mây phù hợp.
- Thiết kế cho các đơn vị/ dự án trong ngân hàng về các giải pháp công nghệ dựa vào công nghệ đám mây.
- Làm việc với đối tác để triển khai các giải pháp đám mây
- Cân nhắc hiệu quả những rủi ro tiềm ẩn của các giải pháp công nghệ đám mây
- Hỗ trợ triển khai các giải pháp đám mây một cách an toàn và bảo mật
- Thực hiện kiểm tra đánh giá hiệu quả của công nghệ đám mây vào trong các giải pháp công nghệ
- Thông qua việc đánh giá liên tục các mối đe dọa và lỗ hổng bảo mật trên đám mây , đưa ra các đề xuất, cải tiến và nâng cao khi cần thiết
2. Công tác quản trị rủi ro và tuân thủ:
- Nhận biết các rủi ro và phối hợp với các đơn vị liên quan để đề xuất phương pháp đo lường và giảm thiểu các rủi ro trong hoạt động.
- Đảm bảo các nhóm trong bộ phận hoàn thành những cam kết về chất lượng phục vụ, tuân thủ các quy định, chính sách của Ngân hàng', 'Your Skills and Experience - Tốt nghiệp Đại học trở lên, chuyên ngành Công nghệ thông tin
- Có kinh nghiệm từ 6 năm làm việc trở lên ở vị trí tương đương
- Có kinh nghiệm với cloud (aws/gcp), có kinh nghiệm với hệ thống lớn
- Có kinh nghiệm với container/microservice/container orchestration/kubernetes (k8s)
- Có kinh nghiệm với configuration management (ansible/puppet), infrastructure as code (terraform/cloudformation), GitOps model
- Quen thuộc với 1 hoặc nhiều ngôn ngữ script (bash/ python). Golang là điểm cộng', "Why You'll Love Working Here WHY BECOME IT/DATA EXPERTS AT TECHCOMBANK?
Investing over 300 million USD to develop large-scale IT projects, Techcombank is one of the leading bank in Technology trends in Vietnam
You will grow with Techcombank by having the opportunity to learn from top experts from across the world
Techcombank provides a rewarding remuneration structure that commensurate with your achievement and contribution
Techcombank is the Top 2 Best place to work in the banking industry where you can experience various exciting activities throughout the year: Company anniversary, Team building, Active Saturday Off, Year End Party, etc."]
