column2:
['Top 3 Reasons To Join Us Surviving Covid & growing stronger every day
Training & Development
Premium Healthcare Insurance', 'Job Description ABOUT YOU
You are a talented and passion driven individual who values working in a fast-growing environment, delivering high quality client-oriented services and collaborating with your peers.
You are a motivated, detailed oriented, have technical skills and energetic person who works well in a fast-paced, dynamic small-team environment. You learn quickly and are passionate about helping others.
ABOUT THE JOB
Your Responsibilities:
Work with DevOps team to shape the architecture, design, and implementations of new and existing systems to enhance their reliability, performance, efficiency, and scalability
Automation of deployment and configuration processes
Develop reliability tools and frameworks for use by DevOps team
Drive efficiencies in systems and processes: capacity planning, configuration management, performance tuning, monitoring and root cause analysis.', 'Your Skills and Experience Requirements:
3 years + in similar role
Strong Python skills and shell scripting experience
A good understanding of large-scale distributed systems in practice, including multi-tier architectures, application security, monitoring and storage systems
Strong knowledge of cloud-based platforms (Azure, AWS, Google) and ready to focus deeper on AWS and Serverless technologies
Hands on knowledge of one or more of the following AWS CloudFormation, Kubernetes/ECS/EKS, Docker, Kafka/AWS Kinesis, Rancher/AWS Fargate, Microservice architecture, automated deployment tools and management of containerized applications.
Good skills in English and the ability to communicate effectively with business and technical teams.
Ability to debug and analyze problems quickly
Ability to learn quickly and apply new skills effectively
Ability to multitask and retain a high attention to detail', "Why You'll Love Working Here Vincere has a diverse, international, and supportive community culture. You’ll collaborate with coworkers and clients across Australia, Europe, the UK and the US. Our English-speaking environment lets you improve your language skills.
When you’re on #TeamVinny, you get the best benefits:
Attractive salary & sign-on bonus $1,000
100% salary during probation period
13th month bonus salary
Premium healthcare insurance for every employee
Yearly health check-ups
13th month bonus salary
Social Insurance on 100% salary
15 days of annual leave, with unused days rolled over to next year (unlimited)
Technical and soft-skills training on Udemy and Coursera
Team outings, company parties, and other exciting events every quarter
Overtime rarely required. OT policies apply for every product release.
At Vincere, we have a saying: when you win, we win. There are always ongoing career opportunities within Vincere.
We look forward to receiving your application."]

column2:
['Top 3 Reasons To Join Us Inspired Leadership Team and Talented Colleagues
Onsite opportunities: North America, Europe, Asia
Attractive salary and benefits', "Job Description Full 13th Month Salary. ***Apply and Join in Sep 20 - Nov 30, 2021
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Acknowledgement of Covid-19 pandemic.
All KMSers will need to working from home to ensure safety. New member will get designated supports:
Working devices will be delivered at door upon the new member's joining date
Onboarding will be organized virtually by both the HR personnel and the new team.
The HR personnel will be available for any support needs of the new member.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Your key responsibilities:
Love Coding.
Follow Your Passion.
Enjoy Every Single Working Day with Your Nice Colleagues and Our Kind Clients.
Take Your Skill to the Next Level.
The responsibility includes: design, coding, troubleshooting and working with project team as well as customers on features/bug fixes.
Your Skills and Experience
Attend and participate in scrum ceremonies
Participate in schema and data modeling design sessions
Implement clean code and adhere to coding best practices and standards
Bench test and provide test coverage for implemented code
Perform code reviews
Maintain and support current implementations of on-going applications and products
Follow required change and configuration management processes
Research and resolve production issues utilizing critical and logical thinking
Perform and support application deployments on lower and production environments as needed", 'Your Skills and Experience General requirements
At least Intermediate level of English level
Likely having 1+ years of experience depending on how fast of your learning and developing technical capability
Familiar with Agile development methodologies (Scrum, XP, Kanban)
Ability to communicate effectively with team members and management
Prioritization of security and privacy
Ability to independently manage time and priorities while meeting deadlines
Sharp troubleshooting, problem solving, and analytical abilities
Willingness to explore new technologies
Ability to handle multiple tasks and deliver projects on time
Technical requirements
Proficient in Python
Strong experience in working with SQL and database design; PostgreSQL experience preferred
Experience in working with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, TypeScript
Experience in Web application/SaaS development
Nice to have/plus:
Experience with one of Python web frameworks such as Django/ Flask/CherryPy, etc.
Experience in working with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, TypeScript
Experience with Python data processing
Experience with Microservices
Experience with NoSQL
Experience in agile software development
Experience with OWASP security best practices
Linux/Unix experience is preferred', "Why You'll Love Working Here Want to be the Best? Join KMS!
It’s positive to claim we’re one of the top IT companies in Vietnam:
From Vietnam, we have crafted brilliant products for millions of global users.
We build awesome global products to conquer the world from Vietnam: QASymphony, Kobiton, Katalon, Witurn, Sprynkl and many more to come.
We’re committed to investing in our people and building a workplace you’ll love coming to every day.
Perks you 'll love at KMS:
Working in one of the Best Places to Work in Vietnam
Building large-scale & global software products
Working & growing with Passionate & Talented Team
Diverse careers opportunities with Software Outsourcing, Software Product Development, IT Solutions & Consulting
Attractive Salary and Benefits
Performance appraisals every year
Onsite opportunities: short-term and long-term assignments in U.S, Europe, Asia.
Flexible working time
Various training on hot-trend technologies, best practices and soft skills
Premium healthcare insurance for you and your loved ones
Company trip, big annual year-end party every year, team building, etc.
Fitness & sport activities: football, tennis, table-tennis, badminton, yoga, swimming…
Joining community development activities: 1% Pledge, charity every quarter, blood donation, public seminars, career orientation talks,…
Free in-house entertainment facilities (foosball, ping pong, gym…), coffee (latte, cappuccino, espresso) and snack (instant noodles, cookies, candies…)
And much more, join us and let yourself explore other fantastic things!"]

column2:
['Top 3 Reasons To Join Us Bonus up to 25% annual salary
Work on highly scalable system
Chance to learn new technology', 'Job Description ZALORA Engineering is looking for a Data Engineer to join our Data Science Team.
Responsibilities
Work daily with machine learning problems. For this purpose, you are expected to be involved in the process of collecting, storing, processing, and analyzing data generated from our database, in addition to joining our data scientists in the design of machine learning models.
Work in a diverse, international setting with teammates who are experts in various topics. We often conduct workshops to improve our individual skill sets, and to improve our workflow as a team. The role is based in our Vietnam office.
Work with cross-functional team members to identify and prioritize actionable, high-impact insights across a variety of core business areas.
Research, design, implement and validate cutting-edge algorithms to analyze diverse sources of data to achieve targeted outcom', 'Your Skills and Experience Bachelor or Master degree in Computer Science or related technical discipline
Fresh graduates with high graduation scores are welcome to apply
1. Be familiar with:
Data structures & algorithms
Basic machine learning algorithms
Any of the following languages: R, Python, Java
Any of the following databases: MySQL, NoSQL, MongoDB, HBase, Cassandra
2. Be knowledgeable in:
Object oriented design and design patterns
Large-scale distributed system systems
Hadoop or Spark framework
Optional: having the following skills is a plus
Good background in statistics
Knowledge in data analysis, data mining, or machine learning
Experience in working with big data', "Why You'll Love Working Here ZALORA is the leading e-commerce company providing fashion throughout South East Asia. ZALORA Engineering has teams in Singapore and Vietnam to serve millions of users in Malaysia, Singapore, Hong Kong, Taiwan, Indonesia, Philippines. This regional diversity presents a lot of interesting challenges that you and your colleagues will face. You will learn a lot by tackling these challenges.
ZALORA's e-commerce platform is built with love by the engineering team. The Ho Chi Minh office, 12 Ton Dan, D4 (ZALORA Group) focuses completely on engineering and sets a high standard for software development in the field of e-commerce. This team creates the tech stack that powers ZALORA's stellar shopping experience. This ranges from the online shop and the mobile apps to ZALORA's complex logistics solutions.
MacBook will be provided
Opportunity to gain exposure working in 6 Southeast Asian markets
Premium Healthcare insurance
Yearly performance bonus (up to 3 months)
15 days annual leave
Company trip every year and many outing trips
Budget for your individual training"]

column2:
['Top 3 Reasons To Join Us Công ty có bề dày phát triển, giá trị cốt lõi vững
Công việc thử thách, cơ hội học hỏi, thăng tiến
Lương cạnh tranh, chế độ đãi ngộ tốt', 'Job Description Tham gia cùng team Data Science (làm việc với các senior có nhiều kinh nghiệm học tập và làm việc tại các quốc gia hàng đầu như US, UK, JP), thực hiện phân tích, báo cáo và xử lý dữ liệu theo yêu cầu của khách hàng phục vụ lĩnh vực sản xuất/ kinh doanh/ chiến lược cho các doanh nghiệp hàng đầu Nhật Bản, Mỹ,..
Nghiên cứu, đề xuất, phát triển và triển khai các giải pháp học máy, học sâu vào bài toán thực tiễn.
Thực hiện coding, lập trình, phân tích dữ liệu, xử lý hình ảnh, xử lý ngôn ngữ tự nhiên.
Đánh giá và tối ưu chất lượng các mô hình AI trong quá trình triển khai thực tế.
Địa điểm làm việc: Phòng 808, tầng 8, tòa nhà Oriental, số 324 Tây Sơn, Ngã Tư Sở, Đống Đa, Hà Nội', 'Your Skills and Experience Các yêu cầu bắt buộc:
Tốt nghiệp Đại học ngành CNTT, Khoa học máy tính, hoặc các ngành khác có liên quan.
Có tối thiểu 2 năm kinh nghiệm lập trình. Thành thạo và có kinh nghiệm làm việc với ngôn ngữ lập trình Python.
Có kiến thức tốt và kinh nghiệm làm việc với các mô hình Machine Learning, Deep Learning, hiểu biết về các ưu điểm và hạn chế của các mô hình.
Có kinh nghiệm sử dụng các công cụ/thư viện sử dụng để phân tích dữ liệu, xây dựng mô hình như SQL, Python (Pandas, Numpy, Scikit-learn), ML Frameworks/tools (tensorflow, pytorch, keras, ...)
Có tư duy logic và thuật toán tốt.
Có khả năng giao tiếp và đọc hiểu tài liệu kỹ thuật tiếng Anh.
Có khả năng làm việc độc lập và làm việc theo nhóm tốt.
Các yêu cầu ưu tiên (không bắt buộc):
Có kinh nghiệm làm việc với công cụ quản lý source như Github, SVN,…
Có kiến thức vững chắc về hệ thống dữ liệu, về lập trình hướng đối tượng và phát triển web app.
Yêu thích và có định hướng trở thành một Data scientist. Ưu tiên ứng viên đã có kinh nghiệm làm phân tích dữ liệu, hoặc các vị trí khác tương đương hoặc có liên quan đến lĩnh vực phân tích dữ liệu.
Biết tiếng Nhật là môt lợi thế.', "Why You'll Love Working Here Mức lương: Từ 18~35 triệu (có thể cao hơn đối với các ứng viên có nhiều kinh nghiệm về Data Science)
Thưởng tháng lương thứ 13
Thưởng dự án theo tình hình kinh doanh
Đóng bảo hiểm full lương (trong cả 2 tháng thử việc)
Bảo hiểm sức khỏe Bảo Việt cho nhân viên và các thành viên khác trong gia đình
Ngày nghỉ: 19 ngày/ năm
Lì xì Tết: 4 triệu VND
Du lịch công ty (8-10 triệu VND/người/năm)
Các dịp team building, sinh nhật tháng, ngày lễ, các event nội bộ như Du xuân, Giải bóng đá nội bộ, Family Day, Halloween, Men’s Day, Women’s Day,..
Các câu lạc bộ thể thao được hỗ trợ kinh phí hoạt động
Được tham gia miễn phí tất cả các lớp training tiếng Nhật và kĩ thuật tại công ty
Nhiều cơ hội phát triển và thăng tiến
Tuần làm việc 5 ngày (từ thứ 2 đến thứ 6), ngày làm 8h."]

column2:
['Top 3 Reasons To Join Us Salary from $600 - $1800
Balanced workplace
Skype Interview in English', "Job Description We are looking for freshers or junior Python developers to join our Python team in Vietnam Office, HCMC
Who We Are:
We are a team of talented developers, architects, managers, engineers, designers, DevOps-engineers, and QA-engineers using brand new tech to solve non-trivial tasks. We work on VR (Virtual Reality), AR (Augmented Reality), IoT (Internet of Things), web projects, mobile apps, Enterprise business applications, and Unity Gaming. We create projects using Python, С#, PHP, Objective-C, JavaScript (React, Vue.js, Angular), Java, and Swift and deploy them into AWS / Azure / Google Cloud.
We're all about collaboration so our teams review and test each other's code, providing regular feedback, and, in line with our Values, we're always improving.
Where We Are:
We believe a diverse range of backgrounds strengthens our team. We also have offices in the USA, Russia, and Vietnam. You will work in our office in Ho Chi Minh alongside our Russia-based teams.
Who You Are:
Have MS/BS degree in Computer Science or equivalent
Very good knowledge in Python and Web Front-end technologies like HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript
Experienced working with more than one Python frameworks such as Django
At least 2-year working experience in the related field
You are good at Python3, Python Internals, algorithms, data structures, and design patterns.
You propose well-designed solutions and implement them with a minimum of bugs (or even without them!)
You plan the work on your solutions before writing code.
You cover your own and the team’s code with tests (unit tests, integration tests, manual tests).
You understand the Big-O analysis of algorithms.", "Your Skills and Experience Preferred Skills:
Django & Django Rest Framework.
Optimization and profiling of Python code.
Query profiling (SQL / NoSQL).
Experience with CSS3 / HTML / JavaScript / Webpack.
Experience with Vue/React/Angular.
Experience or interest in other languages (Scala, Go, C).
Interest in API / DB / Mobile apps design.
Experience in real-time services and application development.
Experience with Hadoop / HBase / Storm / Kafka / Spark / MapReduce.
Experience with TDD.
Good verbal and written communication skills and the ability to analyze your own proposed solutions (and ideas) in terms of ROI (Return on Investment) would be a big advantage! 
What You'll Do:
API and Backend development for mobile, web and IoT applications.
Event stream processing (Kafka / Storm / Spark) and real-time analytics.
New projects and applications development.
Ongoing support of existing production projects.
Technologies We Use:
Python3 / Django / Django Rest Framework.
PostgreSQL / MongoDB / DynamoDB / Redis / RabbitMQ.
Apache Kafka / Storm / Spark, Map/Reduce.
Amazon AWS (EC2, SQS, SNS, ELB, ECS, RDS, S3, DynamoDB).
Google Cloud.
Unit tests.
Docker.
Git / Linters / Jenkins / Upsource.
JavaScript apps (Vue.js).
Linux preferred (Mac is fine as well. No Windows).
What We Appreciate:
Have experience working with database (preferably PostgreSQL, MySQL)
Familiarity with some ORM (Object Relational Mapper) libraries
Basic understanding of front-end technologies, such as JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3)
Proficient understanding of code versioning tools (Git)
Plan your decision before writing the first line of code.
Know how to test your own and foreign code (unit tests, integration tests, manual tests).
Preferred Skills:
Good English skills
Ability to work independently, as well as part of a large team
Willingness to learn new technologies and methodologies
Have knowledge of cloud service provider (AWS, GCP, Azure,...)
Good verbal and written communication skills and the ability to analyze your own proposed solutions (and ideas) in terms of ROI (Return on Investment) would be a big advantage!
What We Appreciate:
Both beautiful code and minimum code.
Clear code that is covered by tests and contains detailed comments.
Developers, increasing the amount of knowledge and experience of the team.
Those who are not afraid of responsibility and work for the result.
Developers who do not require micromanagement and continuous monitoring.
The actual documentation and those who support it.
Sense of humor.
CV in English", "Why You'll Love Working Here Skype Interview in English
We value your skills and contribution
- We offer very competitive salary for our employees.
- Annual salary review based on performance and contribution.
- 13th-month salary.
- Quarter bonus based on performance and contribution.
- Unused leaves in a year will be paid as bonus.
- English learning support and getting technical certification support programs.
- Employee recognition program on company-wide.

We value your growth
- Nice and friendly working environment.
- Lots of interesting and challenge projects to work on.
- Working with smart and straight technical geeks from other countries.
- A chance to travel and get yourself trained at headquarter in California, America.

We value your time
- We don't value working over-time. Better way to do more work: be productive within your working time and spend the rest of your time with your family.
- Flexible working hours scheme is for everyone.
- In case you have a personal stuff, working at home is possible.
- Can't work on that day? No worries, you can work at a weekend to keep your leave.

We value your joy at work
- Full of snacks, fruits, ... in the kitchen to help yourself during work time.
- Need to relax? Get a buddy for a dart, table football or pingpong game.
- Having lunch with colleges or watching news / sports on TV during lunch time.

We value your health
- By default, we don't work on Saturday or Sunday, because we love to see you refreshed in next week.
- Premium health insurance during the year, so you don't have to spend money when you're sicked.
- Annual health-check to make sure you're healthy.

We value social activities outside of work
- Monthly team-building events to have more close relationship with your work-mates.
- Company trips with your family.
- Football match every week for football lovers.
- Join running team to increase your stamina on multiple days in a week.
- Improve your English skills in English club."]

column2:
['Top 3 Reasons To Join Us Top-notch compensation and engaging perks
Cool technologies and fascinating products
Flexible work hours and unlimited leave plan', 'Job Description Parcel Perform is looking for an amazing team member to support us in Software engineering! 
We are a dynamic, fast-growing team that’s excited about e-commerce and logistics and the opportunity to transform these industries with data and technology. Join us and our journey to drive growth in the e-commerce market. We are looking for you as a Data Engineer
WE NEED YOU ON OUR TEAM!
You will be part of a young & motivated team, driving the next level of growth of our Parcel Perform and Parcel Monitor applications that help customers track e-commerce shipments around the globe. As part of our team, you will have a very direct impact on the success of the company.
As a data engineer, you are in charge of the data ecosystem, which includes everything from data sources and databases to data storage solutions. These components are connected by pipelines that transport and transform data. Your work would orbit around the formation of a data lake, and system and tools to consume this data lake.
You will be working side by side with our engineers and data scientists in both data analysis processes and bringing prediction models to the production environment.
And you will also be developing analytical tools and programs. Though we are promoting the use of open sources, some situations call for bespoke software for better customization, user experience, and data accuracy.', 'Your Skills and Experience WHAT YOU SHOULD BRING ALONG!
We at Parcel Perform believe in innovation, energy, and resourcefulness for everything we do. We will not stop delivering an outstanding product that we can be proud of and need you to help us to inform the world. You need to feel the same way about our offering and bring along the following things:
The skills
At least 2 years of working as a data engineer
Solid foundation in Python and at least another language in the JVM family
Deep knowledge of SQL Database design
Experience with distributed system, high volume Databases, and ETL pipelines
Familiarity with Big data analysis
Exposure to a wide range of NoSQL solutions
Excellent critical thinking, organizational and communication skills
Strong ownership and good collaboration skills to work in a team
Good English communication', "Why You'll Love Working Here WHAT YOU WILL RECEIVE IN RETURN!
The competitive compensation package, and a preference for internal promotions.
Unlimited leave plan
Flexible working hours, and open environment. Work From Home is available by requests
Premium insurance and annual medical checkup
Free lunch, free fruit, snacks are provided.
Weekly 1-1 catch-up for training and career development, team bonding events, various training programs.
Unlimited to O’Reilly technical materials.
Opportunities to work alongside people from around the world that share the same passion and dedication.
Locating in a quiet area with little traffic, full of natural light and within walking distance to many convenient facilities, our office in Ho Chi Minh City makes work-life integration to the fullest."]

column2:
['Top 3 Reasons To Join Us Chế độ đãi ngộ, lương, thưởng hấp dẫn
Chiết khấu ưu đãi dành cho CBNV khi mua căn hộ
Bảo hiểm sức khỏe toàn diện-Bảo hiểm tai nạn 24/24', 'Job Description Tham gia xây dựng, tư vấn, phản hồi về kiến trúc tổng quan (high-level design) cho từng thành phần của hệ thống theo kiến trúc micro-services.
Định nghĩa các giao tiếp (API) giữa các thành phần của hệ thống, đảm bảo hiệu quả và tối ưu.
Chịu trách nhiệm tư vấn kỹ thuật, ước lượng khối lượng công việc và thời gian và dẫn dắt sự phát triển phần mềm để đạt kết quả cao nhất.
Hợp tác với các nhóm khác để phát triển và triển khai hệ thống theo thiết kế và kế hoạch đã đề ra
Tham gia tư vấn về kiến trúc của các thành phần hệ thống, khả năng mở rộng (extending), tăng quy mô (scaling), khả năng phục hồi (resiliency) và bảo mật (security).
Đảm bảo việc kiểm thử (testing) được thực hiện đầy đủ từ đơn vị code (unit test) đến toàn hệ thống (end-to-end) và hoàn toàn tự động hoá.
Xây dựng các tài liệu và thực hiện triển khai cho sản phẩm
Hợp tác và cố vấn về kiến trúc (architecture), đánh giá (review) và đảm bảo chất lượng (code quality) phần mềm cho các nhóm/bộ phận liên quan, PM, Dev, QC,... hay những nhóm/bộ phận liên quan đến sản phẩm.
Đóng vai trò chính trong việc đánh giá, phản hồi cho những kiến trúc phần mềm của cả nhóm phát triển nội bộ và các nhóm thuê ngoài để đảm bảo từng thành phần được phát triển theo những quy chuẩn cao nhất và hiệu quả nhất.
Tham gia tư vấn, tham mưu cho các bộ phận khác về những ảnh hưởng của việc thay đổi, chịu trách nhiệm cho việc ước lượng khối lượng công việc cũng như thời gian. Đảm bảo mọi thay đổi đều phải được kiểm thử đầy đủ trước khi triển khai.', 'Your Skills and Experience Tốt nghiệp Đại học chuyên ngành CNTT hoặc các chuyên ngành có liên quan. Có ít nhất 7 năm trong lĩnh vực IT, trong đó 3 năm ở vị trí kiến trúc sư phần mềm.
Tiếng Anh: Giao tiếp, đọc, viết tốt.
Có kiến thức và kinh nghiệm sử dụng ít nhiều ngôn ngữ lập trình và nền tảng: Java/Python/PHP/ .Net/NodeJS/React/Redux, etc…
Có kiến thức và kinh nghiệm thực tiễn áp dụng các mẫu thiết kế (design pattern) - Có kiến thức và kinh nghiệm trong hiện thực các API với RESTful web services, SOAP web services, event-driven message.
Có kiến thức về SOA, Microservices. - Có kinh nghiệm làm việc với Amazon Webservices, Kubernetes, Heroku là một lợi thế.
Có kiến thức và kinh nghiệm sử dụng các hệ CSDL: MSSQL, PostgreSQL, MySQL, Mongo, Arango, ...
Có kinh nghiệm làm việc với các công cụ hỗ trợ cho quy trình phát triển phần mềm (software development lifecycle) như Github, Bitbucket, Gitflow, Jenkins, Travis CI, JIRA Agile, Rundeck, Ansible, Puppet, etc…', "Why You'll Love Working Here Quan điểm nguồn nhân lực là một trong những yếu tố then chốt đảm bảo sự phát triển bền vững, Hưng Thịnh cam kết mang đến chính sách phúc lợi và đãi ngộ hấp dẫn cho tất cả CBNV.
Tăng lương định kỳ hàng năm.
Thưởng vào các ngày lễ lớn trong năm; đánh giá và khen thưởng mức độ hoàn thành công việc của CBNV vào cuối năm.
Khám sức khỏe định kỳ; chế độ bảo hiểm sức khỏe; bảo hiểm tai nạn con người (24/24).
Chính sách chăm lo đời sống CBNV: quà sinh nhật, Trung thu, hiếu hỉ, thai sản, thăm hỏi,...
Hỗ trợ ăn trưa, đồng phục, các chế độ công tác phí, phương tiện đưa đón đối với quản lý cấp cao, …
Phép năm theo luật định; chương trình du lịch nghỉ mát hàng năm để tái tạo sức lao động.
Hoạt động thể thao cho CBNV giao lưu và rèn luyện sức khỏe.
Hỗ trợ nuôi con nhỏ đối với trường hợp CBNV có hoàn cảnh khó khăn.
Chiết khấu ưu đãi dành cho CBNV khi mua căn hộ - thuộc các dòng sản phẩm của Công ty.
Tham gia BHXH, BHYT, BHTN theo đúng quy định của pháp luật.
HỆ THỐNG LƯƠNG THƯỞNG CẠNH TRANH
Tiền lương: tương xứng với vị trí công việc và năng lực. Bậc lương được xác định dựa trên mức độ phức tạp và tầm quan trọng của từng vị trí trong mối tương quan với các vị trí khác trong công ty.
 Tăng lương: định kỳ hàng năm căn cứ vào nhu cầu, tính chất công việc, tình hình hoạt động, quản lý kinh doanh của Công ty và mức độ hoàn thành công việc của CBNV. Ngoài ra, CBNV có thành tích xuất sắc và những đóng góp tích cực có thể được Công ty nâng lương trước thời hạn.
 Chi thưởng: tiến hành thưởng quý đối với CBNV kinh doanh và thưởng năm đối với tất cả CBNV công ty. Quy định khen thưởng, tiêu chuẩn xét thưởng và mức thưởng sẽ được quy định cụ thể theo từng năm trên cơ sở kết quả hoạt động quản lý, kinh doanh của Công ty, Phòng ban/Đơn vị và mức độ hoàn thành công việc của từng CBNV."]

column2:
['Top 3 Reasons To Join Us A product company with strong engineering culture
Clear career path for individuals
Encourage citizenship and employee engagement', "Job Description As a Software Engineer at Teko, together we shape our product. In doing so, you'll face a huge amount of challenges that you may not have a chance facing in any other companies out there. They are:
You will be part of an agile team, working closely with product managers, designers and technical leads to ideate, prototype, build and test new products or features. In short, you take ownership of your work and leads the effort from architecture, implementation, deployment and testing.
Writing clean and reusable code with unit / functional tests and continually increase your code quality.
Having lots of discussions, brainstorming with your team to make technical decisions.
Spending lots of time to review other people’s code so you will learn and understand every piece of the system and making sure we have the best code quality as a team.
Constantly raise your standard, learning new things and sharing knowledge with the rest of the team. We believe it’s more meaningful when we grow as a team.
Taking ownership of the product and constantly find ways to make it better by improving the design, system maintainability, performance and reliability. You will also monitor and troubleshoot application or system issues by deep diving into technical problems. This requires you to understand the whole application and infrastructure stack.
         ---------- Interview online via Google Hangouts -----------", 'Your Skills and Experience BS in Computer Science or similar field of study.
Very solid experience of software development (Python, Golang, Java, JavaScript,..)
Have good knowledge about computer science, data structures, algorithms.
It’s good to have years of experience but as long as you love to code and learn new things, then you are good.
Good to have: Experience with designing and building high traffic applications to serve millions of users.
Good to have: Experience with devops automation tools, CI/CD.
Good to have: Experience with containerization technologies such as Docker, Kubernetes.
Our current tech stacks:
Infrastructure: Linux, Network, Storage (Ceph), Kubernetes
CI/CD: Ansible, Docker, GitOps.
Application layers: Python, Golang, Java, JavaScript.
Distributed systems: Elasticsearch, Apache Spark
Databases: MongoDB, Redis, MySQL', "Why You'll Love Working Here Negotiable salary according to qualification (13th-month salary + Performance Bonus) ;
02 months probation with 100% of Gross salary;
The working environment is open, energetic, and professional. More opportunities for career promotion;
Free Food & Drink: lunch, fresh fruit/cake, coffee & tea.
Premium healthcare: full benefit with social insurance, annual health check, and attractive PTI healthcare coverage under the company’s own policy;
Employee Relationship: company trip,  team bonding & sports club;
Leave Paid: 12 days for annual leave & 6 days for sick leave (max 18 days)
Working time: Monday to Friday (8:30 AM – 5:30 PM).
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
VNLIFE is the newest and second unicorn of Vietnam although its name is relatively unknown to most consumers. 
Aside from its VNPAY-QR network, which is integrated in more than 30 mobile banking apps and available for payment in nearly 100.000 shops across Vietnam, and its diversified portfolio companies in new retails (Phong Vũ, Sói Biển, Vnshop.vn) and online travel (My tour, Tripi, DinoGo), VNLIFE is also a big player in providing technology solutions for both banks and merchants of all sizes. 
Part of the VNLIFE ecosystem (vnlife.vn), Teko Vietnam was incorporated in January 2017 with the motto: Simplify multi-channel retailing with technology. Led by an accomplished leadership team, Tekoers work and grow together, with the current goal of developing solutions and O2O tech products for E-Commerce such as Omni-Channel Retail and Logistics. 
About us:
Teko is a product company. Our engineers take part in every stage of our product lifecycle. Focusing on enhancing the user experience, we continuously study new product designs, practise code readability, improve system performance and reliability. 
We foster a great engineering culture. No individual owns every great idea! Every Tekoer is given opportunities to contribute their feedback, share their product ideas and see their ideas to fruition. We invest in Teko’s long-term growth. It’s not good enough to get things done, but get things done right!
We embrace a strong data-driven culture. We discuss, make decisions and build products based on data and insights. Our current success has been the result of efficiency improvement and cost-cutting solutions for our partners in e-commerce, payment and logistics. "]

['Top 3 Reasons To Join Us Sign on bonus to all level (*)
Great healthcare packages
20 paid leave days and 7 paid sick days per year', 'Job Description We are looking for a Development Team Lead who will lead our Developer and QA and also work closely with our Product Manager and Solution Architecture team to design, build, test and deploy extensions to Skedulo. The Development Team Lead will work within a cross-functional team that is focused on taking growth extensions that will exist as sellable packages to Skedulo customers and developing through iterations on the top of the Skedulo Platform. You will lead and coach our project team and ensure a high-quality standard.
Daily Responsibilities
Involve in design, build, test and deploy projects
Triaging and prioritising incoming issues and ensuring they are distributed as required
Provides technical advice and weighs in on technical discussions / decisions that impact their team
Helps members overcome obstacles, resolve blockers, and complete work tasks
Mentors / coaches direct reports in an open, respectful, flexible, and empathetic manner
Provides positive and constructive feedback to direct reports in a timely manner
Allocation of project work to team members and ensure balanced workload across team
New work estimation review
Ensure high quality team working practices
Additional Responsibilities
Team hiring & onboarding
Manage the performance of the team members
Create / maintain training plan for team members
Create / maintain maturity matrix for team
Supporting the team members in being successful in their role and career planning
Review and track Objectives and Key Results (OKR) including performance meetings', 'Your Skills and Experience Experienced with one or more of the following programming languages: Java, C/C++, .NET, Python
Experienced with developing web application is preferred
Experienced with RESTful APIs and System Integrations
Experienced computer science fundamentals in data structures, design patterns, and ideally complex scheduling and optimization algorithms
Experienced with CI/CD pipeline and automation
A proven ability to learn new products, develop technical knowledge and apply new skills in a high paced environment
Desired candidates enjoy problem solving while learning, developing and applying new skills along the way.
Beneficial to have a working knowledge of Atlassian Suite, JIRA, Confluence and Service Desk
Experienced working with agile development methodologies
Beneficial to have prior experience working with distributed teams
Minimum Qualifications
Must have 2+ years prior experience as a Team Lead in a complex development environment (Salesforce Platform or CRM System is preferred)
Must have at least 5+ years experience in software development
Must have good written and spoken English communication skills
A strong teamwork ethic is essential.', "Why You'll Love Working Here Fun, creative and fast-paced working environment
Competitive salary
13th Month Bonus
MacBook Pro (16-inch, 2019) provided
7 paid sick days per year
20 paid leave days per year
12 public holidays per year
Stock Options/ Equity
Kitchen stocked with snacks & drinks
Paid Parental Leave
Learning & Development Stipend
Employee Referral Bonus
Our offices have creative, open workspaces with room to play, reflect, and relax
Our team is extremely competitive, and we will challenge your best table tennis skills"]

['Top 3 Reasons To Join Us No OT - ever!
Review performance 2x / year
iMac is provided by ITviec', 'Job Description Join our team of "Ít nhưng mà chất" Ruby Supermen!

As Developer Ruby on Rails you will help build and scale the coolest and best job website in Vietnam. In doing so you will help IT people in Vietnam grow their careers, build great things and maybe even change the world. 

You will create front-end UI so beautiful it makes users want to lick the screen. Your back-end code will be so clean it will make a grown man cry. 

Responsibilities:
Develop front-end and back-end for company’s products with high quality code.
Participate in weekly scrum meetings in agile environment
Translate stories from product owner into product features
Be more than a coder -- make suggestions for our product
Ensure scalability and high availability of itviec.com
Ensure security of itviec.com', 'Your Skills and Experience Required:
Minimum 3 years experience developing web applications in Ruby on Rails.
Have solid understanding of programming principles and programming techniques (OOP, FP)
Experience with unit testing Minitest, RSpec
Experience with front end technologies such as Javascript,  HTML/CSS/SCSS.
Solid skills in Relational databases such as PostgreSQL.
Experience with NoSQL database such as Redis.
Experience working with git and Github.
Good communication skills, comfortable communicating in written and spoken English.
Proactive and high sense of responsibility, ambitious, willing to learn, hardworking
Nice to have:
Experience working with AWS.
Experience with Docker.
Experience working on a web product at a product company.', "Why You'll Love Working Here We offer our people:
A fun, friendly place to work
Continuous soft skill training and career coaching
Great working hours -- 8:30 to 5:00 (we believe that 7 hours per day is plenty when you're focused on the right things)
Salary increase every 06 months, 13th salary bonus, super cool paid day off, impressive company trip every year, party every month and many gifts for you.
If you want to learn, if you have fire in your heart and hunger in your eyes, if you want all the responsibility you can handle (and then more), if you want to make a difference in IT in Vietnam -- then ITviec may be for you."]

['Top 3 Reasons To Join Us Attractive salary based on skills and experience,
Free office lunch, coffee, tea and snack everyday
13th month bonus, 100% salary in probation period', 'Job Description • Work closely with the development team (Backend, Frontend, DevOps, IT, Product Owner, Product Management) to collaborate, understand the product requirements and knowledge clearly and accurately.
• Perform all phases of testing including QA, Staging, and Production environments.
• Develop and perform most of the testing types including: Functional test, API test, Performance test, and Security test.
• Develop and perform new automated test scripts on API, Mobile iOS application, Web application, and internal software and tools using PYTHON language only.
• Develop and execute a full flow of automated build and automated test (CI/CD Orchestration).
• Research, provide and perform the automated tests on the Mail server system for the company.
• Execute and maintain existing the automated tests scripts based on test results and/or changes in the product design.
• Develop test scripts to automate sync data between crossed platforms Web, iPhone, iPad.
• Report daily to the Team Leader and Product Management about problems/issues/risks of the product.
• Document working efforts on Confluence to provide feedback, evidence, and a further improvement in the team.
• Take the main responsibility for your own assignment and provide improvements for the product quality.
• Participate in client meetings to discuss and agree on the automation testing approach and follow it up in new automation test opportunities.', 'Your Skills and Experience • At least 2 years in automation testing and ensuring product quality.
• Hands-on experience with a programming language such as Python
• Experience in API automation testing (Python, Java, JMeter, Postman,...)
• Experience in Mobile automation testing (Python, Java, Appium, iOS, Android,...)
• Experience in Web automation testing (Python, Java, Selenium, Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Headless,...)
• Experience in CI/CD process (Github, Jenkins, Gitlab CI, nightly run...)
• Experience in Performance and Security testing is a plus.
• Experience in AWS (EC2, Elastic Load Balancing, Web Application Firewall,...) is a plus.
• Experience in Mail server system testing is a plus.
• Have strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
• Have a proactive and good work relationship with other team members.', "Why You'll Love Working Here We challenge ourselves every day to find better solutions and better ways to do things. We ask difficult questions and work together to solve them. We believe in doing the right things as well as doing things right. We value honesty, hard work, integrity, and transparency. We are committed to transforming people’s lives, will you join us today?
COMPENSATION & BENEFITS
Friendly, flexible, and fun working environment
Very attractive salary based on skills and experience
100% salary during probation period
Monthly team activity allowance
Free office lunch, coffee, tea, snack bar everyday
Full income tax, insurance paid by company (Net Salary)
13th month of salary
Great opportunity for career development
Company trip, team building, monthly party, etc."]

['Job Description Responsibilities
- Apply offensive cyber security testing techniques, coordinate testing projects with internal and external system owners
- Conducting application security assessments and penetration tests (web, mobile, web service, etc.)
- Red Team Tester plans, executes, and presents the results of red team activities.
- Research and building the pentest tool
- Security Research focus on various aspects of application security.', 'Your Skills and Experience Requirements
- At least 2 year experience (may less than if there is real capacity) in pentesting for application (Web App, Mobile)
- Have an understanding of common security vulnerabilities such as SQLi, XXE, CSRF, and others.
- Experience with Penetration Testing tools such as Burp Suite, Metasploit, Kali and others.
- Ability to conduct a Web app pen test without the use of a vulnerability scanner or exploit framework using a browser, proxy, and editor.
- Ability to conduct source code reviews for applications.
- Knowledge of security and architecture testing and development frameworks, such as the Open Web Application Security Project (OWASP), Open Source Security Testing Methodology Manual (OSSTMM), the Penetration Testing Execution Standard (PTES).
- Scripting skills (Python/Perl/Ruby/Powershell)
- Nice if you have OSCP/GPEN/GWAPT
- Nice if you have CVE or good profile on Hackerone, bugcrowd
- CTF experiences always welcome.', "Why You'll Love Working Here Annual Leaves: 
Junior Staff/Associate: 15 days ++
Senior/Manager level: 20 days ++
Birthday leave, Sick Leave without certificate, Flexible Holidays
Bonus: 13th salary and performance review in July annually. 
Others: Digital upskilling program, professional & friendly working environment, team building, flex-wear, secondment opportunity to other countries..."]

column2:
['Top 3 Reasons To Join Us Competitive salary,Bonus
PVI Health Insurance
13th month salary,Happy Friday', "Job Description Personify, founded in 2009, a Vietnam + USA + Taiwan company, is the world's foremost immersive video technology company where we build amazing apps. We are experts in real time image and video segmentation via deep image processing and computer vision, providing virtual background effects (subtraction & blurring), user extraction and user's component detection, and will not be limited to this list. Our technologies provide better and more personal ways for people to interact with each other via virtual background in video conferencing services.
As a Software Research and Development engineer in IPCV (Image processing, Computer Vision) domain, you will contribute to the development and improvement of the Personify Segmentation Software Development Kit (SDK) which is the company’s core product being used in our existing applications, such as ChromaCam and Presenter, as well as licensed to many big companies around the world.
Besides doing research and implementation of new ideas and technologies, you will support the deployment of the SDK in our company’s applications and in customers’ applications.", "Your Skills and Experience RESPONSIBILITIES:
Analyze and formulate industrial needs into technical problems and solve them.
Research, invent and improve patentable algorithms in our cutting-edge research projects.
Employ these research ideas into high-quality production code of the SDK
Support our marketing team and customers to roll out the SDK
Analyze and resolve issues and feedback to keep customers happy with our product.
For leader/head role:
    ► Work with product managers to build great products and features
    ► Analyze feedback from customers & QC team to convert into tasks plan to improve the products
    ► Plan tasks and distribute problems to other team members.
    ► Work with other teams to support greater success as a company
    ► Grow the team and make it a solid group of R&D engineers in the domain in Vietnam!
 GENERAL QUALIFICATIONS:
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related major with at least 3 years experience.
Interest in doing research and implementing new things.
Passion in creating great products and supporting customers to successfully use the products.
MS or PhD degree is a strong plus.
Ability to lead a team and being familiar with Agile methodology is a plus.
Excellent in troubleshooting, problem solving, and analytical skills.
Good experience in end-to-end quality software development process.
Fluent in practical English.
Good team player and quick learner.
 TECHNICAL QUALIFICATIONS:
Solid with C++/C++11 STL, boost, opencv, cmake, OOP and software design patterns.
Strong in algorithms and troubleshooting.
Experienced in code optimizations, design of large software, multithreading and asynchronous concepts, cross platform development.
Good experience on Windows software development is required. Knowledge of MacOS, iOS, and Android are desirable.
Experience in GPU parallel programming (CUDA, OpenCL, Metal) is a plus.
Experience in Image/Video processing and Computer Vision or Machine Learning or Deep Learning (AI) is  a plus.
Ability to understand and implement scientific papers.
Familiar with Python and/or Matlab is a plus.", 'Why You'll Love Working Here We value our people and always want to support our staff with all the best conditions that we can. If you want to learn more about what we are offering, let's join us today!
💱 Very competitive salary that matches with your talents and contributions.
► Senior level: $1,500 – $2,000 / month.
► Senior+/Lead level: $1,800 – $2,800+ / month.
💲  Yearly salary review
💰 13th month salary
🏆 Surprised bonuses that recognize outstanding contributions.
🎥 Make a difference together: chart the future course of the computer vision and video conference industry.
🛃 Work, learn, share and have fun with talented, young, dynamic & friendly colleagues in both US, Taiwan and Vietnam.
🎼 Enjoy an energetic, open and transparent working environment.
🎓 Acquire a variety of technical and soft skills from experienced Software Engineers and Entrepreneurs
🍺 "Beer" every Friday.
👰 Extra Health Insurance PVI
🎡  Annual paid leave: 12 days
🛌 Medical paid leave: 12 days
💳 Labor contract, social insurance, unemployment insurance are fully based on Vietnamese law
💻 Working devices are provided
💡 Clearly defined long-term career road-map for those who are qualified
✈️ Have opportunities to travel to the US, Vietnam, Taiwan for business trip when required
🍰 Other team building activities.
We are urgently looking for those who match this position: if this sounds like you, we can't wait to hear from you -- please update your CV with all the great things your have and apply today!']

column2:
['Job Description Công việc chính:
Tham gia công tác phân tích nghiệp vụ và định hướng phát triển hệ thống cho công ty
Đưa ra các giải pháp kỹ thuật/kiến trúc hệ thống đáp ứng bài toán cho quản lý
Tham gia triển khai các giải pháp kỹ thuật/kiến trúc hệ thống trong dự án
Nghiên cứu, tìm hiểu cập nhật công nghệ mới và truyền đạt kiến thức cho các thành viên trong công ty, triển khai vào dự án cụ thể
Tham gia chia sẻ kỹ năng, kinh nghiệm và kiến thức thông qua workshop/seminar.
Công việc khác:
Báo cáo công việc hàng ngày đến quản lý trực tiếp.
Những yêu cầu khác do quản lý bộ phận giao', 'Your Skills and Experience Có kinh nghiệm tối thiểu 3 năm khả năng lập trình nhiều hơn một ngôn ngữ lập trình trong các ngôn ngữ sau: Java, .Net, Scala, Nodejs, Python, Golang.
Có khả năng lập trình chuyên sâu một trong các ngôn ngữ kể trên.
Có khả năng phân tích nghiệp vụ hệ thống.
Nắm rõ các kiến trúc hệ thống cơ bản dựa trên Java và các công nghệ liên quan.
Có kinh nghiệm với một trong các hệ quản trị CSDL: Oracle, Postgres, MongoDB, MariaBD.
Có khả năng tìm hiểu, nghiên cứu, đánh giá các công nghệ mới (AI, Big Data, Block Chain, IoT) từ đó áp dụng vào các dự án thực tế.
Hiểu rõ các yêu cầu phi chức năng của hệ thống (Scalability, Security, Adaptability, Compatibility, Manageability, Avaiability).
Có khả năng giao tiếp và thương thảo tốt, có khả năng quản lý nhóm nhỏ (từ 3-7 người trở lên).
Ưu tiên các ứng viên có kinh nghiệm sau:
Kinh nghiệm với Docker, Docker Swarm/Kubernetes là một lợi thế
Nắm vững quy trình phát triển phần mềm với Scrum/Agile/Kanban là một lợi thế
Có kinh nghiệm với streaming/messaging framework như: MQTT, RabitMQ, Kafka là một lợi thế.
Có kinh nghiệm về Design Patterns and Code refactoring
Yêu cầu về kỹ năng:
Kỹ năng giải quyết vấn đề tốt với cách tiếp cận logic và phân tích hợp lý.
Khả năng tư duy tốt, tinh thần trách nhiệm và ý thức về chất lượng cao
Có khả năng giao tiếp tốt, tư duy sáng tạo.
Khả năng làm việc nhóm tốt', "Why You'll Love Working Here •  Chế độ lương cao, hấp dẫn, lương tháng 13, thưởng KPI, thưởng release sản phẩm, xét thưởng theo năm, thưởng thêm vào các dịp lễ, tết, đánh giá hàng quý xét tăng lương ít nhất 2 lần/ 1 năm, có năng lực sẽ được đánh giá ngay tại thời điểm.
•  100% Nhân viên đều được đóng bảo hiểm.
•  Kiểm tra sức khỏe hàng năm, tiệc cuối năm: mỗi năm một lần
•  Được hỗ trợ ăn trưa, cung cấp laptop siêu nhân cho bạn để bạn thỏa sức sáng tạo ý tưởng.
•  Quà sinh nhật, tiệc trái cây hàng tuần, xây dựng đội nhóm, bóng bàn.
•  Được nghỉ phép 12 ngày phép/ năm mà lương vẫn được nhận bình thường.
•  Văn phòng rộng rãi, thoáng mát, tiện nghi. Được mặc thoải mái những gì bạn thích đơn giản để bạn có thể thỏa sức sáng tạo.
•  Cơ hội đi công tác nước ngoài giống như đi du lịch, được tài trợ các hoạt động cộng trong team, được giao lưu nâng cao kiến thức lập trình và trải nghiệm thực tế.
•  Lộ trình thăng tiến rõ ràng"]

column2:
['Top 3 Reasons To Join Us Huge performance based bonus
Explosive growth in both company and career
State-of-the-art technology and innovation', 'Job Description About Fika:
Fika is a female-focused dating app founded by two graduates from Europe’s top universities. With a strong background in mathematics, AI, finance, and marketing, we have high ambitions to create the best dating app in the world. We are looking for talented, energetic, and proactive people to join our team!
The Position:
You will be a member of a high-performing team accountable for developing and maintaining Fika Mobile Application, powered by Flutter, Python, Golang on AWS, and MongoDB. As a Junior DevOps Engineer, you will, among other things, contribute to the design of Fika’s infrastructure to run across different regions and scale to millions of users.
Responsibilities:
Managing the Fika’s AWS infrastructure, ensuring the infrastructure has enough capacity to handle the volume of traffic.
Applying best practices into the infrastructure design to balance between scale vs cost.
Develop infrastructure automation using the Infra-As-Code principle. Responsible for testing your own code to ensure the integrity of the IasC repo.
Support the release pipeline by developing CI/CD workflow.', 'Your Skills and Experience Qualifications:
Knowledge on AWS Ecosystem, especially EKS, EC2, S3, CloudFront, IAM.
Knowledge on monitoring & scaling MongoDB.
Knowledge with Prometheus ecosystem for monitoring & observability.
Ability to write Terraform for managing complex environments.
Ability to write scripts using one of the following languages: Bash / Python
Open-minded, hard-working, ambitious, and eager to learn new things.
A plus if you have:
1+ years of AWS experience
Experience working in Sprints and with the Agile process', "Why You'll Love Working Here REMOTE WORK IS 100% AVAILABLE
Salary: Negotiable, based on experience.
AWS Certificate: We will provide all the resources for you to achieve multiple AWS certificates to both improve your own skills as well as grow together with Fika.
Office: Landmark 81 by Vinhomes Central Park, one of Vietnam’s most modern office areas.
Benefits: Laptop, paid social & health insurance, 13th-month salary, and free access to the gym.
Holidays: National Holidays in Vietnam and 12 days of paid annual leave
Working hours: In general 09:00 - 18:00 Monday to Friday.
Other: Joining a dynamic, fast-growing startup with a young and friendly environment, aiming to become Vietnam’s leading dating app before expanding into Southeast Asia in 2022.
We are interviewing on a rolling basis and recruit as soon as we have found the right candidate."]

['Top 3 Reasons To Join Us Attractive salary, remunerative benefits and perks
Self-development in an innovative ecosystem 
International working environment', 'Job Description We’re looking for a Data Engineer who can find suitable solutions to tough problems. As a Data Engineer, you’ll create and manage our data pipelines and Big data tools, including collecting, storing, processing and analyzing our data and data systems. You’ll also make this data easily accessible across the company and usable in multiple departments

Building toolsets/frameworks to manage, integrate with the various data sources, provide an efficient way for data science and business team exploring the data
Collaborate with other teams (Business users, IT teams, IT global team) on requirements and implementation approaches for reaching the project’s goals.
Enable Data Science teams to test and productionize various ML models, including propensity, risk and fraud models to better understand, serve and protect our customers
Build and expose metadata catalog for the Data Lake for easy exploration, profiling as well as lineage requirements
Optimizing data processing and monitoring data platform.', 'Your Skills and Experience >2 years of hands-on experience as a Data Engineer or similar roles, preferably in big data infrastructure

column2:
['Top 3 Reasons To Join Us International working environment
Highly scalable platforms with 2+ billion visits
Great colleagues', 'Job Description Global Fashion Group (GFG) is the leading fashion and lifestyle retail destination in Asia Pacific, Latin America and CIS. We connect over 10,000 global, local and own brands to a market of more than one billion consumers through four established e-commerce platforms: THE ICONIC, ZALORA, dafiti and lamoda. Through an inspiring and seamless customer experience enabled by our own technology ecosystem and operational infrastructure, we are dedicated to being the #1 fashion and lifestyle destination in our markets. With 17 offices and 10 fulfilment centres across four continents, GFG proudly employs a dynamic and diverse team with deep local knowledge and expertise. In the first half of 2019, GFG delivered over 15.8 million orders to 12 million active customers.
ABOUT THE FUNCTION
At GFG, Technology is core to long-term success and is a crucial enabler of a great Customer Experience. We are a mix of experts in fashion, logistics, data analytics, marketing, and design, guided by business consultants and tech geniuses – everyone contributes to the success of GFG.
As an Engineering Manager you will be responsible for leading and managing a chapter of full-stack software engineers. You will drive the progress of the product. You will report to the Senior Director of Engineering, and work with Product and Scrum leaders, data scientists and engineers.
ABOUT THE ROLE 
You will be working closely with other people in the teams to provide architectural vision and strategy for GFG’s internal tools suite, and you will have the capability to provide detailed technical guidance to the team, enabling them to execute more effectively and deliver products on time. 
You will also investigate the latest technologies to improve site reliability, the developer experience and raw performance. Furthermore, you also would have experience in mentoring, coaching and retaining talent as People are our greatest assets.', 'Your Skills and Experience Proficiency in full-stack web development including Javascript, ES6+ and NodeJS.
Good understanding of AWS (our stack is powered by Lambda).
Experience building web apps, PWAs and their accompanying APIs.
Experience using ReactJS.
7+ years of experience with distributed systems and client-server architectures, 2+ years of experience in a leadership role with current technical expertise.
A solid foundation in computer science, with strong competency in data structures, algorithms, software design and deep understanding of software design patterns.
Humility, a strong sense of purpose and a strong value system.
Hold yourself and your team accountable to high engineering standards.
Ability to hire and groom strong software engineering talent and to develop a happy, high-performing team.
Ability to manage team dynamics, understand and tailor development to the career aspirations of team members.', "Why You'll Love Working Here Annual Leave: 15 days
13th month salary
Annual bonus: up to 3 months based salary (depends on company performance)
Medical benefits: Social insurance, medical insurance & AON insurance
Macbook Pro is provided
Support for English class
Support Gym membership
Additionally, we offer a flat hierarchy, a fun and flexible work environment."]

and non CMS (Salesforce, Adobe CC, etc.).
Kick off a team of Plugins' Heroes, dedicated to expend our ecosystem and market footprint.
Develop new features and maintain existing plugins, like WordPress or Magento
full list of existing connectors can be found on our website
provide connectors' users level3 support, investigate issues by doing research & involving other teams as needed, and enrich Knowledge Base as needed.
Collaborate with Scaleflex' Devops, Senior Back and Front End leads to ensure flawless integration from specifications to documentation.
Anticipate and identify security issues that may arise, monitor third party releases and their impact the existing connectors and plugins.
Answer on different support channels: internal chat, ticketing system, public forums, developers networks, and more.
Work on standard working hours (e.g. Mon.- Fri. 9am to 6pm) but be flexible enough in the event of release or exceptional emergency to be reachable after 6pm.", 'Your Skills and Experience Strong autonomy, self-discipline and smart organization are essential qualities to perform in an international and remote team. The ideal candidate must be "hungry but humble" and work with passion towards achieving common and personal goals.
Requirements
Our Team is built around people with a strong entrepreneurial culture and can-do attitude. We love people able to “do something out of nothing” and strive to get better every day.
In order to fit with our culture, you must be/have:
3 year of coding experience, preferably in a web/cloud environment as a PHP/js Developer.
With experience of at least 1 year developing CMS plugins & connectors.
Knowledge of PHP frameworks like Laravel or Symfony would be an advantage
Knowledge of javascript and especially the React (native) library would be an advantage
Excellent analytical and troubleshooting skills.
Knowledge of CDN technologies, and SaaS / Cloud products development.
Bachelor degree in Computer Science or equivalent.
Quick learner with a desire to learn new development languages and tools.
Fluent English skills (verbal and written) with outstanding interpersonal skills.
Additional language skills (verbal and written) in French or German would be a plus but not mandatory.
Additional DevOps-like skills in order to handle test servers or develop APIs semi-autonomously (ideally Python, pgSQL) would be a plus but not mandatory.
Additional working knowledge of other plugins programming language like .net would be a plus but not mandatory.
…and a sense of humor is an absolute must!', "Why You'll Love Working Here At Scaleflex, the most important thing is not where you come from but where you want to go, and especially how! Traditional team silos are broken and team members are involved in cross-functional activities to allow everyone to learn as much as possible and identify where (s)he can excel.
Benefits list :
18 days of leave per year,
13th month of salary,
Very dynamic career path: if you also secretly love QA, Design, Marketing, or any other fitting open position, don't hide and let's talk about it!
Full coverage allowances: lunch & parking, but also gym, birthday voucher and more
Included social insurance and premium healthcare insurance
Weekly after-work and Monthly team outing, yearly team building week overseas
With a Team of 40 spread across France, UK, Germany, Bulgaria, Egypt and Vietnam and thanks to a strong automation in our operations, we are able to serve more than 1500 happy customers worldwide with our current SaaS offering Cloudimage. Self-funded until now, we have decided to accelerate our growth in 2020 with our first external investment and the launch of our new product: Filerobot.
The passion for crafting beautiful user-centric products and conquering limitless markets brings us together.
Add to this an obvious taste for speed (karting, skiing), travel (Europe, Asia and more) and team sports (basketball first), you will obtain a great company culture and turf to thrive."]

['Top 3 Reasons To Join Us We build a professional & fun working environment.
We focus on your growth, yes the long-term growth.
We develop the future-ready digital bank platform.', 'Job Description As a Senior QC Engineer, you are primarily responsible for all automation + manual skills to test our system (web/mobile applications)
Good test automation skills with popular frameworks (Selenium, Cucumber)
Understanding Page Object Pattern
Experience in BDD and Typescript, Python
Knowledge for front-end testing
Knowledge of Java for back-end testing
JIRA, Swagger, Bitbucket, Postman
Nice to have: performance testing JMeter, Zephyr', 'Your Skills and Experience To collaborate with different systems in an Agile project delivery model, understand business requirements, Author test cases, execute them and ensure a quality product is being delivered.
Analyze BDD/User stories from the PO, review and come up with high-level test scenarios to meet user requirements.
Code tests to ensure that all end-to-end scenarios are covered.
Interact with various stakeholders and drive resolution to logical closure
Responsible for verifying overall project software quality.
Advocate the quality culture in cross-functional teams and make sure that the best practices are followed.
Design, develop, execute and maintain test cases, for our Android and iOS applications and REST API
Establish testing as an integral part of the development process within cross-functional teams
Use exploratory testing techniques to discover and prevent issues
Assess and bring improvements to the quality of our applications and services', "Why You'll Love Working Here HR benefits
Competitive salary
Salary band per level and employee benefits are reviewed once per year
13th month salary pro rata depending on the employee’s length of service (within a calender year), paid with the December salary
Monthly lunch allowance: 700,000 VND/employee
Parking: GFT covers the monthly parking fee for employee motorbikes
Performance evaluation is once per year, for 2 purposes:
   > Performance bonus   > Salary increments
Talent retention policy (Retention bonus)
2-year anniversary = 0.5x monthly salary
3-year anniversary = 1x monthly salary
5-year anniversary = 2x monthly salary
Paid with salary of month of anniversary.
Health care
Private health insurance: including accident, outpatient, in-patient, maternity, and dental for all permanent employees who pass 2-month probation.
Optical: expense claim for eyewear
Annual health check-ups.
Vacation
Maximum 18-day vacation leave/year (with the ability to carry over 05 days till 31st March of the following year)
Adding one more annual leave day for each two-year anniversary.
Healthy lifestyle
Sports and hobby clubs: company has an annual fund for fitness activities, which is allocated per month as team’s vote.
Range of healthy snacks, tea, coffee, milk and beer on tap:
> Tea, coffee and milk are available at pantry area – WeWork
> Beer is available at pantry area – WeWork
> Snack is available in GFT office.
Social
Company townhall: each 6 weeks
Monthly team lunch at restaurants
Monthly team engagement activities: one activity per month
CSR activities: as per company’s CSR guideline and practice
Hackathon: once per year
Onsite tour/training courses at other GFT offices and client’s destination overseas (where applicable)."]

['Top 3 Reasons To Join Us Global and professional environment
Attractive salary and benefits
Fresher Accepted', 'Job Description As a Backend Developer, you will be part of the team of professionals using up-to-date technologies, especially AWS technologies and applying professional software development and testing practices. 
Under the guidance of the PM and training provider, you will be able to develop systems components of medium to high complexity and apply best practice in cyber security.
Responsibilities and duties:
Perform functional analysis, application design, development, unit test, deployment and maintenance
Participate in software development life cycle and custom enterprise application development
Ensure the committed project deadline is met with high quality
Team player, good communication skills and interpersonal skills
Collaborate closely with project manager and software architect to discuss project requirements, design and technologies related research', 'Your Skills and Experience Your Skills and Experience
Minimum Qualifications:
2+ years in Java
1+ years nodejs or python.
Experience with Java 8, threading and concurrency, Spring Boot, Gradle.
Experience with container technologies like EKS, ECS, Docker, and Kubernetes.
Desired Qualification:
Good at logical and technical problem solving
Good knowledge of data structures, system design and algorithms
Experience in cloud based technologies including Amazon Web Services (AWS) is a big plus.', "Why You'll Love Working Here Salary Ranges:
Fresher: $350 ~ $600
Junior: $600 ~ $950
Senior: $950 ~ $1,500
Technical Solution: $1,500 ~ 2,000
Salary & Allowances:

Vacation 1 - 2 times / year
Travel abroad for business trips, training courses (like Amazon web service event)
Annual Health check
Will pay 50 - 100% of education courses related to the job
Sport Activity Funding (Football, etc.)
Career Path:
Develop your own career without any limit. Fresher, Junior, Senior Developers for both Back-end and Front-end. Solution Architect or Project Manager are possible alternative destinations.
Have the opportunity to learn, then apply the newest AWS, Big Data, AI / ML technologies.
Working with AWS solution architects directly.
Improve both technical and business skills, especially at e-Commerce domain, Payment gateway, big data, more con-current users, etc. Improve problem solving skills.
Working Environment:
Friendly, Global and Professional working environment
Working time: Monday – Friday
Working hours are flexible and the standard guideline is between 8:30 AM to 18:00 with a 1.5 hour break for lunch.
Weekly Happy hour
Company trip, team building & other community Tech activities
Agile transformation environment in which you can practice Agile, Scrum everyday."]

Ưu đãi sử dụng dịch vụ nội bộ', 'Job Description Work with ecosystem data teams to understand customer and partner needs and drive a roadmap of analytics to meet customer needs.

['Top 3 Reasons To Join Us 13th month bonus
Annual health check-up
15 days full paid leave a year', 'Job Description Job Description 
Summary: 
The Technical Manager will lead 3 teams of developers, supporting them in building the company’s R&D projects. You will work closely with Vietnam Country Manager to develop a strategy for the team to meet the company’s goals and objectives and to improve the quality of the service it delivers internally and externally. You will need to plan and monitor the successful implementation of this strategy. 
The Technical Manager is responsible for the quality and technical approach taken by team members, ensuring it is in-line with the company strategy – and that projects are delivered on time and on budget. Creating and maintaining a professional culture within the team, where individuals take ownership and are fastidious and proud of delivering excellence and quality. 
About You 
You will be in charge of the development of the most important projects in the company 
WE ARE LOOKING FOR SOMEONE 
∙ To lead and manage 3 teams of senior web developers and software developers 
∙ To be responsible to deliver on-time and on-quality features following the product pipeline 
∙ To setup development process and ensure that all team members acknowledge and follow  correctly
∙ To create or maintain CI/CD deployment process together with DevOps team, setup roles and  rules in order to manage product environment including development, staging and production 
∙ To ensure a high SLA for live product, be contactable in the event of incidents happen during no working hours 
∙ To coach and guide team members on how to solve difficult technical issues, it’s also expected for the Technical Manager to provide technical direction or to do actual implementation (if needed) 
 ∙ To have a responsible attitude toward the product development, any incidents relate to technical, Technical Manager should be the first one to take responsibility 
∙ To coordinate with other departments to receive requirements for development, also to provide technical experience/suggestions to help them in decision making and planning
∙ To review and report project progress and overview of the performance of all individuals in team ', 'Your Skills and Experience REQUIREMENTS 
Experience
• Bachelor degree or equivalent 
• Diploma in Digital Design or related field 
• At least 5 years of web & mobile development experience 
• At least 3 years of development management experience 
Skill 
• Working knowledge in: Angular, NodeJS, Python, PHP, TypeScript and Flutter 
• Strong knowledge with Git repositories management and git flow 
• Experienced with CI/CD system, experienced with Team City is a plus
• Experienced with Scrum/Agile process, able to manage the process 
• Effective in communication, presentations, negotiations and organization using English 
• Hands-on experience in managing product environments including development, staging and production
• Experienced with AWS, Linus OS 
Authority Reporting 
The Technical Manager will report directly to the Country Manager', "Why You'll Love Working Here Why joining GO GAME?
- We do what we love ^^
- We have FUN!
- Personal Development and challenging projects
- Flexible working-hours, Dynamic, Innovative and Friendly environment
 "]

['Top 3 Reasons To Join Us Committed 13th-mth bonus + attractive yearly bonus
Premium Healthcare for you and 2 family members
16++ days of paid leave per year', 'Job Description Working in the most complex Automotive tool chain system, your contribution is to increase the engineering efficiency and precision in SDLC of automotive industry. You will work directly with German expert to:
Automate, administer and manage the overall Linux based infrastructure and services which includes deployment, configuration and management of Linux systems
Builds, installs, configures, analyzes, tunes, and troubleshoots systems to achieve optimum performance levels
Monitors and analyzes resource usage to recommend/develop enhancements to system capabilities and performance
Resolves difficult system problems and provides consultation or training
Compares, evaluates, and implements new technologies, and integrates them into the cloud computing environment
Participates in capacity, performance and availability planning for system configuration, software services, network services, load distribution, and service interrelationships among systems and services', "Your Skills and Experience Bachelor's degree or equivalent in Computer Science, Information Systems, Engineering, or another related field
Have at least 2 years in similar role, responsible for one of the following areas: DevOps, Continuous Delivery and Automation practices.
Experience with continuous integration tools (such as: Jenkins, TeamCity, AWS CodePipeline) or configuration management tools (such as: Ansible, Chef, Puppet)
Experience with monitoring systems and services (e.g. Telegraf, Grafana, Prometheus, Splunk)
Experience with Linux-Windows and writing programs using a high-level programming language (e.g. Java, PowerShell, Python or Shell scripting)
Experience using Docker and container orchestration, such as Kubernetes is a plus
Prefer automation mindset, system, issue analytics and investigation skill
Experience with networking protocols and implementations
Good English communication skills", "Why You'll Love Working Here Why BOSCH?
Because we don't just follow trends, we create them.
Because together we turn ideas into reality, working every day to make the world of tomorrow a better place. Do you have high standards when it comes to your job? So do we. At Bosch, you will discover more than just work.
Benefits and Career Opportunities
Working in one of the Best Places to Work in Vietnam
Join a dynamic and fast growing global company (English-speaking environment)
13th-month salary bonus + attractive performance bonus (you'll love it!) + annual performance appraisal
100% monthly basic salary and mandatory social insurances in 2-month probation
Onsite opportunities: short-term and long-term assignments
15++ days of annual leave + 1 day of birthday leave
Premium health insurance for employee and 02 family members
Flexible working time
Lunch and parking allowance
Various training on hot-trend technologies/ foreign language (English/Chinese/Japanese) and soft-skills
Fitness & sport activities: football, badminton, yoga, Aerobic
Free in-house entertainment facilities and snack
Join in various team building, company trip, year-end party, tech talks and a lot of charity events"]

['Top 3 Reasons To Join Us Lộ trình phát triển sự nghiệp đa chiều
Cơ hội đào tạo, công tác tại Nhật, Singapore, Mỹ..
Mức lương hấp dẫn, chế độ thưởng dựa trên năng lực', 'Job Description • Join full development circle for Cloud/Server system (design, implementation, unit
test, migration) to control smart device.
• Designing, developing, and deploying modular cloud-based systems.
• Educating teams on the implementation of new cloud technologies and initiatives.
• Design / Manage CI/CD development model
• Design / Develop Server Software', 'Your Skills and Experience • Experience in at least one programming language Node.js/Java/Python or C#, etc
• Experience in working with Cloud (API Gateway, Load-balancing, CICD, etc)2.
• Experience in working with Database: PostgreSQL, MongoDB or DynamoDB, etc.
• Preferred if having Azure, AWS certifications
• Preferred if having experience about DevOps
• Preferred if having experience about Back End Development', "Why You'll Love Working Here Panasonic R&D Center Vietnam is one of the leading R&D Centers with professional and friendly global working environment. We offered flexible and diversified benefits package that ensure the best things to the employees.
1. Career Path Development
• Clearly defined long-term multi-career roadmap;
• Unlimited development & training opportunities (Language Training, Technical Training, Soft-skill Training, On-job Training, etc.)
• Oversea business trips (Japan, China, Singapore, US, Mexico, EU, etc.)
2. Work-life Balance
• Flexible working time that supports work-life balance (Core time: 9:00-16:00; 5 days from Monday - Friday/ week)
• Flexible lunch time;
• Additional special holiday
3. Wellness
• Well-protected with 24/7 personal accident and medical care insurance;
• Well-designed Annual Health Check-up program;
4. Activities
• Team-building activities; Birthday Party; Year-end party; Sport Day/ Family Day
• Summer Vacation (Trip to famous tourist spots domestic/ overseas,…)
5. Cash Benefits
• Attractive and competitive salary & bonus package depend on abilities, performance and competencies
• Diversified allowance scheme
6. Physical Environment
• Grade A Office with creative workplace and open space.
• Well-equipped facilities/ devices and professional working platforms."]
